GSP29snyayvpu:359: advayavijñānatattvasādhanenānukūlam ācarasīti cet, syād etat, yadi bhavataḥ pramāṇaparidṛṣṭasakalavyavahārocchedena
GSP29snyayvpu:360: kudarśanavāsanāhitādṛṣṭādvayatattvaparikalpanāt pratikūlaṃ na syāt. tan nārthaviraheṇa bahiḥpramāṇabhūtajñānollāso 'sti, nirhetukatvaprasaṅgād
GSP29snyayvpu:362: [NAV_4.3] grāhakam iti ca nirṇāyakaṃ draṣṭavyam, nirṇayābhāve
GSP29snyayvpu:364: kalpanāpoḍham abhrāntam'; iti tad apāstaṃ bhavati, tasya yuktiriktatvāt.
GSP29snyayvpu:365: tathā hi: te nirvikalpakatve 'dhyakṣasyāyuktīḥ kheṭayanti -- kiledam
GSP29snyayvpu:366: arthasāmarthyenodīyate, sannihitārthakriyāsamarthārthagrāhakatvāt. na cārthe dhvanayaḥ santi, taddhetuvilakṣaṇakāraṇāntarajanyatvāt, tataś cāsāv upanipatya svagocaraṃ saṃvedanam utthāpayan svākāram anukārayati. tan na tadgrāhiṇi vijñāne śabdasaṃśleṣo yuktaḥ. kiṃ ca, yady utpādakārthopayoge 'pi taṃ tāvan na gṛhṇīyāt, saṃvedanam api tu smaraṇasampāditaṃ tadabhidhāyakadhvanisaṃyojanaṃ pratīkṣamāṇaṃ tāvad āsīta, tarhi datto jalāñjalir arthagrahaṇasya. tathā hi: tam artham apaśyaṃs tasmin gṛhītasaṅketaṃ tadabhidhāyakadhvaniṃ nānusmaraty, upāyābhāvād,
GSP29snyayvpu:367: ananusmaraṃś ca purovartiny arthe na yojayati, smṛtyupasthāpanavyatirekeṇa
GSP29snyayvpu:368: tadyojanāśakter, ayojayaṃś ca bhavadabhiprāyeṇa na paśyatīti dhāndhyād
GSP29snyayvpu:369: āndhyamāpadyeta. yadi cendriyajam api jñānaṃ vikalpakaluṣitam iṣyeta, tadā tad api manorājyādivikalpavad vikalpāntarāvirbhāve sati nivarteta; na cāitad asti, sannihitagopiṇḍagocarasya cakṣurjasaṃvedanasyāśvādiviṣayavikalpodaye 'py anivartanāt,
GSP29snyayvpu:373: aśabdakārthasāmarthyodbhavatvād dhvanirahitam adhyakṣam iti, tad ayuktaṃ,
GSP29snyayvpu:374: na hi śabdāsampṛktārthajam ity etāvatāivābhilāpavinākṛtam iti vaktuṃ
GSP29snyayvpu:375: śakyam, anyathā jaḍārthajanitam iti jaḍam api tat syāt. atha bodharūpamanaskārasāhityān na jaḍam iti brūṣe, tathā saty abhilāpasaṃsṛṣṭamanaskārasanniyogāt sābhilāpam api syāt. kiṃ ca, viviktāḥ paramāṇavaḥ svākārārpaṇadvāreṇa svagocaraṃ jñānam utpādayantaḥ katham asantam ātmani svāvayavavyāpinaṃ kālāntarasaṃcariṣṇum ākāraṃ tatra
GSP29snyayvpu:376: prathayanti. vibhramād iti cen, na, nedānīm arthe yad asti tad eva
GSP29snyayvpu:377: pratibhāti, tatrāsato 'pi sthūrākārasya pratibhāsanāt. tathā śabdo 'pi.
GSP29snyayvpu:378: yady avidyamāno 'rthe tadgrāhiṇi jñāne pratibhāseta kiṃ kṣūyeta? yac
GSP29snyayvpu:380: āsītety'ādi yāvad ‘āndhyam āpadyeta', tat tāvakapakṣe 'pi samānam. tathā
GSP29snyayvpu:381: hi: svalakṣaṇaviṣayendriyajanirvikalpakajñānasadbhāve 'pi na tāvad idaṃtayānidaṃtayā vārthavyavasthitir, yāvad vidhipratiṣedhadvāreṇa vikalpayugalakaṃ pāścātyaṃ nodayate, yatrāivāṃśe vikalpaṃ janayati,
GSP29snyayvpu:382: tatrāivāsya pramāṇatetivacanān, nirvikalpakasya sato 'pi vyavahāraṃ praty asatkalpatvāt. sa ca vikalpaḥ saṅketakālabhāvitam abhilāpasāmānyam anusmarata evotpattum arhati, abhilāpasāmānyasmaraṇabījaṃ ca kutaḥ
GSP29snyayvpu:383: prabudhyeta? tādṛśadarśanād iti cen, nanu tad api darśanaṃ nirvikalpakatvād arthaṃ nātiśete, tat kathaṃ sāmānyaviṣayavikalpabījaṃ
GSP29snyayvpu:384: prabodhayet? arthaḥ punaḥ sāmānyavyavasāyātmikāṃ buddhiṃ na janayed iti bhavatāṃ kadāgrahaḥ. tad arthavat tadviṣayaṃ darśanaṃ vyavasāyaśūnyatvān nābhilāpasāmānyagocarasmaraṇabījaṃ prabodhayati; tad aprabuddhaṃ na
GSP29snyayvpu:385: smaraṇaṃ janayaty; ajātaṃ smaraṇaṃ na śabdaṃ yojayaty; ayojitaḥ śabdo nārthaṃ niścāyayaty; aniścito 'rtho na vyavahāram avataraty; anavatīrṇo nādṛṣṭād viśiṣyate; aviśiṣṭaḥ pramātur āndhyaṃ lakṣayatīti. tasmād yathā kathañcinnirṇayābhāvāt svayam apratītam api nirvikalpakadarśanaṃ vāsanāprabodhadvāreṇa vikalpam utthāpyātmavyāpāram abhilāpayati
GSP29snyayvpu:386: katicidaṃśaviṣayaṃ, tathārtho 'pi yadi cakṣurādisāmagryantaḥpātitvenāpratīta eva svayaṃ, tathāsvabhāvatvāt,
GSP29snyayvpu:387: saṅketakālabhāvitābhilāpasāmānyaviṣayātmasaṃskāraprabodhadvāreṇātmaviṣayam abhilāpasaṃsṛṣṭaṃ saṃvedanam ullāsayen nātyantam ayuktaṃ paśyāmaḥ. na cāyaṃ savikalpako bodho manorājyādivikalpakalpaś,
GSP29snyayvpu:388: cakṣurādisāmagrīsampādyatvād, itarasya tu manomātraprabhavatvāt. ataḥ kathaṃ tadvikalpāntarāvirbhāve nivarteta? mānasavikalpasyāiva vikalpāntareṇa nivartanād, asya tu kāraṇasāmarthyena balāt pravṛtteḥ.
GSP29snyayvpu:389: etena saṃhṛtasakalavikalpāvasthāyāṃ nāiṣa prāduḥṣyād ity etad api
GSP29snyayvpu:390: pratikṣiptam, asya pramātur icchayā saṃhartum aśakyatvān,
GSP29snyayvpu:391: mānasavikalpasaṃharaṇa eva tatsāmarthyopapatter iti. etac ca śabdasampṛktapratyakṣapakṣād apy ekāntanirvikalpakapratyakṣapakṣasya
GSP29snyayvpu:393: [NAV_4.5] paramārthataḥ punaḥ pratyakṣe sākṣāc chabdollekho neṣyate,
GSP29snyayvpu:395: sannihitaṃ parisphuṭaṃ svāvayavavyāpinaṃ kālāntarasaṃcariṣṇuṃ sthagitakṣaṇavivartam alakṣitaparamāṇupārimāṇḍalyaṃ padārthāntaraiḥ saha samānāsamānākāraṃ svaparamāṇūnāṃ sāmānyākāraṃ stambhādhikaṃ padārthaṃ gocarayatīti savikalpakam ity ucyate,
GSP29snyayvpu:396: paraparikalpitakṣaṇakṣayiviviktaparamāṇulakṣaṇasvalakṣaṇagrahaṇapravaṇanirvikalpakapratyakṣapratiṣedhārthaṃ kathañcidabhilāpasaṃsargayogyagocaratādarśanārthaṃ vā. evaṃ ca pratyakṣagocarīkṛte 'rthe saṃjñāsaṃjñisambandhagrahaṇādayas tadviṣayāḥ śābdavyavahārāḥ sarva eva nirupacaritā ghaṭanta ity uktaṃ bhavati. yadi punaḥ śabdasaṃsargayogyapratibhāsam adhyakṣaṃ na syāt, tataḥ ko doṣa iti
GSP29snyayvpu:398: nirvyavasāyaṃ darśanam atyantapāṭavopetam api smṛtibījādhānaṃ taduttarakālabhāvi vā tādṛśārthadarśanaṃ tatprabodhanam abhyāsavāsanāpāṭave 'pi na vidhātum alaṃ, yataḥ sāmānyavikalpotpattyā vyavahāraḥ pravarteta, kṣaṇikatvādiṣu sakalakālaṃ nirvikalpakādhyakṣadṛṣṭatayābhyupagateṣv api tadadarśanāt. tasmād yatra kutracid arthāṃśe pāścātyavyavahārapravṛttis tatra prācīnaṃ saṃvedanaṃ
GSP29snyayvpu:400: vyavahāraḥ pralīyeta. tan na kadācana kalpanāpoḍhatvaṃ pratyakṣasya pramātur api pratītigocaracāritām anubhavati. apratītaṃ cāstīti śraddhātuṃ
GSP29snyayvpu:402: [NAV_4.6] abhrāntatvam api na jāghaṭīti, bhavadabhiprāyeṇa sthirasthūrārthagrāhiṇaḥ saṃvedanasya viparyastarūpatvāt, tadviparītasya tu svapnakāle 'py aprakāśamānatvāt. tad yadi yathāvasthitārthagrāhitvam
GSP29snyayvpu:403: abhrāntatvaṃ, tan na sambhavaty eva, viviktakṣaṇakṣayiparamāṇūnāṃ kadācid apy apratibhāsāt, teṣāṃ ca pāramārthikatvāt. atha vyāvahārikābhiprāyeṇa yad idaṃ ghaṭādikaṃ svalakṣaṇam arthakriyākṣamaṃ, tatra yan na bhrāmyati tad abhrāntam ity abhipretaṃ, tarhi kalpanāpoḍhapadam utsāraṇīyam, idānīm anena sahāvasthānābhāvād, vyavahārāvatāriṇo ghaṭādisvalakṣaṇasya nirṇayenāiva grahaṇād, anyathā vyavahārāpravṛtter, dṛṣṭasyāpy
GSP29snyayvpu:404: adṛṣṭānatiśayanāt. tasmād vyavasāyātmakam adhyakṣam ity etad eva cārv iti sthitam.
GSP29snyayvpu:405: [NAV_4.7] aparokṣatayety anena tu parokṣalakṣaṇasaṅkīrṇatām adhyakṣasya pariharati, tasya sākṣātkāritayā arthagrahaṇarūpatvād iti. īdṛśam ity amunā tu pūrvoktanyāyāt sāvadhāraṇena viśeṣaṇakadambakasacivajñānopapradarśanāt paraparikalpitalakṣaṇayuktasya
GSP29snyayvpu:406: pratyakṣatāṃ pratikṣipati. evaṃ ca yad āhur: "indriyārthasannikarṣotpannaṃ
GSP29snyayvpu:407: jñānam avyapadeśyam avyabhicāri vyavasāyātmakaṃ pratyakṣam" tathā
GSP29snyayvpu:408: "satsamprayoge puruṣasyendriyāṇāṃ buddhijanma tat pratyakṣam" ityādi tad ayuktam ity uktaṃ bhavaty, apūrvaprādurbhāvasya pramāṇabādhitatvād,
GSP29snyayvpu:409: atyantāsatāṃ śaśaviṣāṇādīnām apy utpattiprasaṅgāt. tasmād idam ātmarūpatayā vidyamānam eva viśeṣakṛddhetukalāpasannidhānāt sākṣād arthagrahaṇapariṇāmarūpatayā vivarteta; tathā cotpannajanmādiviśeṣaṇaṃ na
GSP29snyayvpu:410: sambhavet. athāivaṃvidhārthasūcakam evāitad ity ācakṣīthās, tathā saty avigānam evety āstāṃ
GSP29snyayvpu:412: aparokṣatayārthasya grāhakaṃ jñānaṃ pratyakṣam ity uktam, tasmād itarad asākṣād arthagrāhakaṃ jñānaṃ parokṣam iti jñeyam avagantavyam. etad api svasaṃvedanāpekṣayā pratyakṣam eva, bahirarthāpekṣayā tu parokṣavyapadeśam
GSP29snyayvpu:413: aśnuta iti darśayann āha: grahaṇekṣayeti; iha grahaṇaṃ prakramād bahiḥ pravartanam ucyate, 'nyathā viśeṣaṇavaiyarthyāt; tasyekṣāpekṣā tayā;
GSP29snyayvpu:414: bahiḥpravṛttiparyālocanayeti yāvat. tad ayam artho: yady api svayaṃ
GSP29snyayvpu:416: vyāpriyata iti parokṣam ity ucyate. etac ca bubhutsitārthānyathānupapannārthāntarapratītivaśād udayadharmakaṃ iti.
GSP29snyayvpu:417: sāmānyalakṣaṇasadbhāvād ekākāram api vipratipattinirākaraṇārthaṃ dvidhā bhidyate, tad yathā: anumānaṃ śābdaṃ ceti. yato 'dyāpi
GSP29snyayvpu:418: śabdasyārthānyathānupapannatvam eva pare na pratipadyante, na cāpṛthakkṛtasya tadviviktaṃ vaktuṃ śakyam, ato bhedenopanyāsaḥ.
GSP29snyayvpu:421: anumānaṃ, tad abhrāntaṃ pramāṇatvāt samakṣavat // NA_5 //
GSP29snyayvpu:422: [NAV_5.1] ihāpy anumānam iti lakṣyanirdeśaḥ, tasya prasiddhatayā anūdyatvāt. sādhyāvinābhuno liṅgāt sādhyaniścāyakam iti lakṣaṇanirdeśaḥ,
GSP29snyayvpu:423: tasyāprasiddhatayā vidheyatvād iti. atrāpy anumānaśabdasya kartrādikārakavyutpattikrameṇārthakathanaṃ pramāṇaśabdavad draṣṭavyam.
GSP29snyayvpu:425: paścān mīyate paricchidyate 'rtho 'numeyaḥ pāvakādir yena jñānena tad anumānam iti. tat kiṃbhūtam ity āha: sādhyaniścāyakam iti -- sādhanam
GSP29snyayvpu:426: arhati, sādhayituṃ vā śakya iti sādhyo 'numeya ity arthaḥ; tasya niścāyakaṃ tatsvarūpanirṇāyakam iti yāvat. tat kuta ity āha: liṅgāl --
GSP29snyayvpu:427: liṅgyate gamyate 'rtho 'neneti liṅgaṃ hetus tasmāt. kiṃbhūtād ity āha:
GSP29snyayvpu:428: sādhyāvinābhuna iti -- vinā bhavatīti vinābhu, tato 'nyad avinābhu,
GSP29snyayvpu:429: sādhyenāvinābhu sādhyāvinābhu, sādhyaṃ vimucya yan na bhavatīty arthaḥ,
GSP29snyayvpu:430: tasmāt sādhyaniścāyakaṃ jñānaṃ tad anumānam. smṛtam abhipretaṃ nītividbhir
GSP29snyayvpu:431: iti sambandhaḥ. tatra liṅgāt sādhyaniścāyakam ity anenānumānasya pratyakṣaśābdalakṣaṇasaṅkīrṇatāṃ vārayati. sādhyāvinābhuna ity anena
GSP29snyayvpu:435: anupalabdhiḥ svabhāvaḥ kāryaṃ ceti; tad uktam:
GSP29snyayvpu:438: [NAV_2] tathānye: "'syedaṃ kāryaṃ kāraṇaṃ saṃyogi samavāyi virodhi ceti
GSP29snyayvpu:439: laiṅgikam" iti, tathā: "pūrvavac cheṣavat sāmānyatodṛṣṭam" ityādi -- tad bālapralapitaprāyam ity avagantavyaṃ, sarvatra sādhyāvinābhāvitvasyāiva gamakatvāt, tadrahitasya tu trailakṣaṇyalakṣitasyāpy agamakatvād, itarathā tatputratvādīnām api gamakatvaprasaṅgān, niyamavat. trailakṣaṇyaṃ
GSP29snyayvpu:440: lakṣaṇaṃ, na yatkiñcit, tenāyam aprasaṅga iti cen, na, niyamena
GSP29snyayvpu:441: sādhyāvinābhāvitvasyāivoddīpanāt; tac ced asti kiṃ trailakṣaṇyāpekṣayā,
GSP29snyayvpu:442: tasyāiva gamakatvāt. tathā hi: jalacandrān nabhaścandraṃ, kṛttikodayāc
GSP29snyayvpu:445: anumimīmahe. kālādikas tatra dharmī samasty eva, tatra pakṣadharmatā liṅgasya gṛhyata iti cen, nātiprasaṅgād, evaṃ hi śabdasyānityatve sādhye kākakārṣṇyāder api gamakatvaprasaktes, tatrāpi lokāder dharmiṇaḥ
GSP29snyayvpu:446: kalpayituṃ śakyatvāt. tathānvayavikalo 'py anityaḥ śabdaḥ, śrāvaṇatvād ity ayaṃ samyagghetutayā samarthayituṃ śakya iti, nānvayo 'pi hetor lakṣaṇam.
GSP29snyayvpu:447: tathā hi: tāvakākūtenāiva sakalaṃ sattvam anityatayā kroḍīkṛtam iti
GSP29snyayvpu:448: bhāvadharmaḥ śrāvaṇatvaṃ katham anityatāṃ vihāya vipakṣe vartitum
GSP29snyayvpu:451: nirātmakatve tadvaikalyaprasaṅgād, ghaṭādivad ity ayam api gamako vyākhyātaḥ, sādhyārthānyathānupapannatvasyātrāpi
GSP29snyayvpu:453: [NAV_5.3] tathā kāryasvabhāvānupalabdhirūpaliṅgatrayaniyamo 'pi kila tādātmyatadutpattilakṣaṇasambandhāstitvam eteṣv eveti yaḥ kriyate, so 'py
GSP29snyayvpu:455: mā bhūt tasya tādātmyatadutpattibhyāṃ gamakatvaṃ, samavāyād bhaviṣyati,
GSP29snyayvpu:456: tathāpi nānyathānupapannatvam eva hetor lakṣaṇam iti yadi vaiśeṣiko manyeta, so 'nyathā nirloṭhanīyaḥ. sa hi vikalpataḥ paryanuyojyaḥ:
GSP29snyayvpu:457: samavāyibhyaḥ samavāyo 'bhinno bhinno vā. yady abhinnaḥ, samavāyina eva tarhi, na samavāyaḥ, tadavyatiriktatvāt, tatsvarūpavat. bhinnaś cet, sa kathaṃ teṣu varteta: sāmastyenāhosvid ekadeśena? tad yadi sāmastyena, tad
GSP29snyayvpu:458: ayuktaṃ, samavāyabahutvaprasaṅgāt, pratisamavāyi tasya parisamāptatāvāpteḥ. athāikadeśena, tad apy acāru, sāṃśatāprasaṅgena
GSP29snyayvpu:460: tatrāpi sāmastyapakṣe bahutvaṃ tadavastham eva. ekadeśapakṣe tv aṃśāntaraprasaṅgenānavasthā. tan na samavāyabalāt gamakatāṃ praty āśāvidheyā, tasyāiva tatra duḥsthitatvāt. etena saṃyogino 'pi gamakatā
GSP29snyayvpu:461: pratyuktā, samānadūṣaṇatvāt. virodhino 'pi viruddhābhāvagamakatvam anyathānupapannatvam eva sūcayati, tadabhāve gamakatvāyogāt.
GSP29snyayvpu:462: [NAV_5.4] evaṃ paraparikalpitam anyad api liṅgalakṣaṇaṃ yad gamakatāṅgaṃ tad anyathānupapannatvaṃ na vyabhicarati, sādhyaṃ vināpy upapadyamānasya
GSP29snyayvpu:465: [NAV_5.5] tad evam anumānalakṣaṇaṃ pratipādyādhunā yac chauddhodaniśiṣyakair nyagādi, yad uta -- bhrāntam anumānam,
GSP29snyayvpu:468: tasyādhyavasāyād, atasmiṃs tadgrahaṇasya ca bhrāntilakṣaṇatvāt. prāmāṇyaṃ punaḥ praṇālikayā bahiḥ svalakṣaṇabalāyātatvād anumānasya. tathā hi:
GSP29snyayvpu:469: nārthaṃ vinā tādātmyatadutpattirūpasambandhapratibaddhaliṅgasadbhāvo, na tad vinā tadviṣayaṃ jñānaṃ, na tajjñānam antareṇa
GSP29snyayvpu:471: arthāvyabhicāritvād bhrāntam api pramāṇam iti saṅgīryate; tad uktam:
GSP29snyayvpu:472: "atasmiṃs tadgraho bhrāntir api sambandhataḥ prameti" -- tad apākartum āha: tad abhrāntam ityādi. tad anumānaṃ, bhrāmyati svagocare viparyasyatīti bhrāntaṃ, tato 'nyad abhrāntam, aviparītārthagrāhīti yāvat.
GSP29snyayvpu:473: iyaṃ ca pratijñā. pramīyate yathāvasthito 'rthaḥ paricchidyate 'neneti
GSP29snyayvpu:474: pramāṇaṃ, tadbhāvas tattvaṃ tasmāt. ayaṃ tu hetuḥ. saṅgatam akṣāṇām iti
GSP29snyayvpu:475: samakṣaṃ, tad iva samakṣavad iti dṛṣṭāntaḥ. tad idam anumānasya
GSP29snyayvpu:477: avayavatrayapratipādanenāivākṣiptatvāt. pramāṇaṃ sūcitam, prayogas tv evaṃ
GSP29snyayvpu:478: draṣṭavyo: 'bhrāntam anumānaṃ, pramāṇatvād, iha yad yat pramāṇaṃ tat tad
GSP29snyayvpu:479: abhrāntaṃ yathā samakṣaṃ, tathā ca pramāṇaṃ bhavadbhir abhyupagamyate 'numānaṃ, tasmāt pramāṇatvād abhrāntam iti pratipadyantām iti.
GSP29snyayvpu:480: tatrārthavādī tāvat samakṣalakṣaṇe dṛṣṭānte sādhyavikalatām āvirbhāvayituṃ na pārayati, svayam eva samakṣasyābhrāntatayā 'bhyupagamāt. śūnyavādinaḥ punaḥ samastāpalāpitvāt pramāṇaprameyavyavahāraṃ praty ayogyatāiveti na tam adhikṛtya svasādhanadoṣāḥ parihartavyāḥ, svavacanabādhitapratijñatvena
GSP29snyayvpu:481: tadvādotthānābhāvāt. tathā hi: sarvābhāvapratipādakaṃ vaco 'sti, nāsti vā?
GSP29snyayvpu:482: yady asti tarhi pratijñāhāniḥ. atha nāsti, sakalabhāvasiddhiḥ,
GSP29snyayvpu:484: [NAV_6.0] jñānavādī punar vedyavedakākāravikalaṃ sakalavikalpagocarātītaṃ nirvikalpakaṃ viviktapāramārthikasvasaṃvedanavedyaṃ saṃvedanam āgūryānādikālālīnavāsanābalaprabhāvitaṃ grāhyagrāhakākārakaluṣitaṃ
GSP29snyayvpu:485: bahiṣprathamānaṃ nikhilam api jñānaṃ viparyastatayā pratijānānaḥ samakṣalakṣaṇasya prakṛtadṛṣṭāntasya sādhyaśūnyatām abhidadhyād, atas tanmatavikuṭṭanārtham āha:
GSP29snyayvpu:487: bhrāntaṃ pramāṇam ity etad viruddhaṃ vacanaṃ yataḥ // NA_6 //
GSP29snyayvpu:488: [NAV_6.1] yad bhavataś cetasi vivartate, yad uta na kevalam anumānaṃ bhrāntaṃ, kiṃ tarhi yad bhavadbhir dṛṣṭāntatayopāttaṃ pratyakṣaṃ tad api bhrāntam eva, "sarvam ālambane bhrāntam" ity vacanāt, tad etan na. kuta ity āha: pramāṇatvaviniścayād iti, pramāṇabhāvanirṇayād ity arthaḥ.
GSP29snyayvpu:489: [NAV_6.2] nanu ca pramāṇatām abhrāntatānyathānupapannāṃ yadi paraḥ
GSP29snyayvpu:490: pratipadyate, tatas tām abhyupagacchan kathaṃ bhrāntatāvipratipattiṃ vidadhyād iti pārśvasthitavacanāvakāśam āśaṅkya, bhrāntatāpramāṇatayor virodhasādhanena tataḥ pramāṇatāṃ vyāvartyānanyaśaraṇatayā pratijñātābhrāntatākrāntāṃ tāṃ darśayann āha: bhrāntam ityādi. bhrāntaṃ viparyastam atha ca pramāṇaṃ grāhyaparicchedahetur ity etad vacanam
GSP29snyayvpu:493: [NAV_6.3] nanu ca nāivāsya viruddhatā, tathā hy:
GSP29snyayvpu:494: aviditaparamārthavyāvahārikābhiprāyeṇa lokasaṃvṛtiṃ ghaṭayanto vayaṃ dṛḍhataravāsanāprabodhasampāditasattākayoḥ pratyakṣānumānayoḥ pramāṇatām
GSP29snyayvpu:496: śithilavāsanāunmukhyanirmitajanmakayoḥ punar apramāṇatāṃ, tadākūtenāiva darśite 'rthe vipralambhanād iti, bhrāntatāṃ punas tattvacintakābhiprāyeṇa
GSP29snyayvpu:499: artho 'vayavirūpo 'vayavarūpo vā syād, gatyantarābhāvāt. na tāvad avayavirūpo vicāraṃ kṣamate, 'vayavavirahe 'vayavitvāyogāt, teṣu ca tadvṛttivikalpānupapatteḥ. tathā hi: teṣv asāv ekadeśena vartate sāmastyena vā. na tāvad ekadeśena, tasya svayaṃ niravayavatvāt.
GSP29snyayvpu:502: pratyavayavaṃ parisamāptarūpatayāvayavibahutvaprasaṅgāt. bhedapakṣe doṣo 'yam, abhedapakṣe nāstīti cen, na: tatrāpy avayavamātram avayavimātraṃ vā
GSP29snyayvpu:504: samastāvayavavyāpino 'vayavino 'bhyupagame paṭāder ekadeśarāgakampadarśanādiṣu sakalarāgakampadarśanādīni durnivārāṇi syur,
GSP29snyayvpu:506: vicāragocaracārī karacaraṇaśirogrīvādīnām avayavānāṃ svāvayavāpekṣayāvayavirūpatayā taddūṣaṇenāivāpāstatvāt. paramāṇūnāṃ niraṃśatayāvayavatvam upapadyata iti cen, na, teṣām api dikṣaṭkasambandhena ṣaṭaṃśatāpatter, anyathāvasthānābhāvāt. tataś cārthavirahāt tadunmukho grāhyākāro 'līkas, tadalīkatāyāṃ grāhakākāro 'pi
GSP29snyayvpu:509: sarvatrāvyabhicaritarūpatvāt, tasmāt sa eva pāramārthika iti.
GSP29snyayvpu:510: [NAV_6.4] atra pratividhīyate -- yad avādi saṃvedanam advayaṃ
GSP29snyayvpu:511: pāramārthikaṃ, grāhyagrāhakākārapravṛttaṃ punar atāttvikam iti, tad
GSP29snyayvpu:512: ayuktaṃ, pramāṇābhāvāt. tathā hi: bahir antaś cānekākāratayā
GSP29snyayvpu:513: harṣaviṣādādibhiḥ sthirasthūratādyanekadharmaparikaritārthagrahaṇapariṇāmaiś ca vivartamānaṃ saṃvedanam upalabhyate, na punar vedyavedakākāraviviktaṃ yādṛg bhavadbhir upavarṇyate jñānaṃ tādṛśaṃ kasyacit kadācana pratītigocaracāritām
GSP29snyayvpu:514: anubhavaty, advayapratibhāsasya svapnadaśāyām apy ananubhūteḥ. na ca tattvacintakā api pramāṇam antareṇa svākūtaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayantaḥ prekṣāvatām avadheyavacanā bhavanty, anyathāikam acetanam avyayam api brahmānekaṃ cetanaṃ kṣaṇabhaṅguratākrāntam avidyātaḥ prathata iti bruvāṇo 'nirākāryaḥ
GSP29snyayvpu:515: syāt. yad api bahirarthanirākaraṇadhiyā avayavyavayavadvāreṇa dūṣaṇam adāyi, tad api bahir antaḥ prathamānasakalāsumatpratītapratibhāsamudgaranirdalitaśarīratayā bhaktamadhyaniṣṭhyūtadarśinaḥ purato vipratāraṇapravaṇakuṭṭinīśapathaprāyam iti na vidvajjanamanāṃsi rañjayati,
GSP29snyayvpu:517: kiṃ ca, saṃvedanasyāpi sitāsitādyanekākāreṣv ekasya vartane bhedābhedasāmastyāikadeśādicodyaṃ samānam eveti na dūṣaṇam.
GSP29snyayvpu:518: anekākāravivartasyālīkatvān na tena saha saṃvedanasya pāramārthikasya bhedābhedādicinteti cen, nanv evam itaretarāśrayaṃ duruttaram āḍhaukate.
GSP29snyayvpu:519: tathā hi: tadalīkatvasiddhāv advayasaṃvedanasiddhis, tatsiddhau ca tadalīkatvam iti nyāyāt. anyac cādvayam apy ekakṣaṇavarti saṃvedanaṃ yathā
GSP29snyayvpu:520: pūrvottarakṣaṇābhyāṃ sambandham anubhavati, tathā niraṃśā api yadi paramāṇavo digaṃśaiḥ paramāṇvantarair vā saṃśleṣamāgaccheyuḥ kim ayuktaṃ syāt. na cāvayavyavayavayor ekāntavyatirekāvyatirekapakṣe yad dūṣaṇaṃ tad
GSP29snyayvpu:521: asmatpakṣabādhākaraṃ, parasparāvinirluṭhitarūpayor vivakṣayā sandarśanīyabhedayos tayor abhyupagamād, bahir antaś ca tathāiva prakāśamānatayā tayor nihnotum aśakyatvāt. etena rāgārāgakampākampādivirodhodbhāvanam api prativyūḍhaṃ, pramāṇaprasiddhe
GSP29snyayvpu:522: 'rthe virodhābhāvāt, pramāṇabādhitasyāiva viruddhatvāt, kuyuktivikalpānāṃ ca pratyakṣāpahnave nirmūlatayā bādhakatvāyogāt,
GSP29snyayvpu:524: tadviparyayasampādyo virodho dūrāpāsta eva. kiṃ ca, svayam eva saṃvedanaṃ
GSP29snyayvpu:525: paramārthasaṃvyavahārāpekṣayā pratyakṣāpratyakṣasavikalpakāvikalpakabhrāntābhrāntādirūpam abhyupayato bahirarthe viruddhadharmādhyāsapratiṣedhabuddhiḥ kevalaṃ jāḍyaṃ sūcayati.
GSP29snyayvpu:526: tan na pramāṇaṃ kathañcid bhrāntaṃ samasti, svarūpapracyavaprasaṅgād iti sthitam.
GSP29snyayvpu:527: [NAV_6.5] nanu ca taddarśitārthālīkatayā jñānasya bhrāntatā, na svarūpeṇa,
GSP29snyayvpu:528: na ca tadudayasamaye kasyacid idam alīkārtham idaṃ tv analīkārtham iti vivekenāvadhāraṇaṃ samasti, bhrāntābhrāntābhimatayos tadekarūpatayā prakāśanāt. yadā ca viśadadarśanapathacāriṇo 'pi śaśadharayugalādayo
GSP29snyayvpu:530: alīkārthatāśaṅkānivṛtter anāśvāsa eva. na ca tadarthaprāptyādikam
GSP29snyayvpu:533: tasya svagocaraparyavasitatvena bādhakatvāyogāt. anyathā nīlam ādadānā
GSP29snyayvpu:535: sarvapratibhāsasya bādhakābhāvasiddheś ca samānatā. tasmād bhrāntābhrāntajñānabhrāntir iyaṃ bhavatāṃ, vivekābhāvena sarvasyālīkārthatvād iti.
GSP29snyayvpu:539: [NAV_7.1] evaṃ manyate: yo 'pi samastasaṃvedanasya bhrāntatāṃ pratijānīte,
GSP29snyayvpu:541: tadbhrāntatāyogāt. evaṃ ca tajjātīyam anyad apy abhrāntaṃ syāt, tataś ca sakalapratibhāsasya samastasaṃvedanasya bhrāntatvāsiddhito
GSP29snyayvpu:542: viparyastatvāniṣpatter yat sphuṭaṃ svānyaniścāyi suniścitatayā svaparaprakāśakaṃ tat pramāṇam iti sambandhaḥ. tac ca dvayasiddhau
GSP29snyayvpu:543: svarūpārthalakṣaṇayugmaniṣpattau prasiddhyati niṣpadyate, anyathā prameyābhāve pramāṇābhāvāt. tasmāt pramāṇam urarīkurvāṇenārtho 'py
GSP29snyayvpu:545: [NAV_8.0] tad evaṃ svārthānumānalakṣaṇaṃ pratipādya tadvatāṃ bhrāntatāvipratipattiṃ ca
GSP29snyayvpu:549: [NAV_8.1] atrāpi śābdam iti lakṣyam, anūdyatvāt. dṛṣṭeṣṭāvyāhatād ityādi lakṣaṇaṃ, vidheyatvāt. dṛṣṭena pramāṇāvalokiteneṣṭaḥ pratipādayiṣito
GSP29snyayvpu:552: puruṣopayogī śakyānuṣṭhāno vārtho vācyas, tam abhidhātuṃ śīlaṃ yasya tat paramārthābhidhāyi, viśiṣṭārthadarśakam ity arthaḥ. tatas tattvagrāhitayotpannaṃ prakṛtavākyapratipādyārthādānaśīlatayā
GSP29snyayvpu:553: labdhātmasattākaṃ yan mānaṃ tac śābdam iti prakīrtitam upavarṇitaṃ pūrvācāryair iti sambandhaḥ. tatra dṛṣṭeṣṭāvyāhatād ity anena kutīrthikavacasāṃ laukikavipratārakoktīnāṃ ca śābdatāṃ nirasyati,
GSP29snyayvpu:554: pramāṇabādhitatvāt. vākyād ity amunā tu vākyasyāiva niyatārthadarśakatvāt
GSP29snyayvpu:556: paramārthābhidhāyina ity anena jvaraharatakṣakacūḍāratnālaṅkāropadeśādivacanaprabhavajñānasya niṣphalatayā prāmāṇyaṃ nirācaṣṭe. tattvagrāhitayotpannam ity amunā tv evaṃbhūtād api vākyāc chrotṛdoṣād viparītādyarthagrahaṇacaturatayā
GSP29snyayvpu:557: prādurbhūtasya śābdatvaṃ vārayati. mānam ity anenāntarbhāvitapropasargārthena śābde parasyāprāmāṇyabuddhiṃ
GSP29snyayvpu:559: tryavayavahetusūcakatvenopacāratas tasya prāmāṇyaṃ, na tattvata iti cen,
GSP29snyayvpu:560: nāpramāṇasya sūcakatvāyogāt. nanu ca hetupratipādane yadi tat pramāṇaṃ,
GSP29snyayvpu:561: tato hetusamarthakapramāṇāntarapratīkṣaṇaṃ viśīryeta, tenāiva nirṇītasvarūpatvāt tasya, pramāṇaprasiddhe punaḥ pramāṇāntaravaiyarthyāt.
GSP29snyayvpu:563: 'rthe vikalpapratīkṣaṇāt tasyāiva prāmāṇyam āsajyeta. tadgṛhītam evārtham asāv abhilāpayatīti cec chabdapratipāditaṃ hetuṃ pramāṇāntaraṃ
GSP29snyayvpu:565: [NAV_9.0] śābdaṃ ca dvidhā bhavati: laukikaṃ śāstrajaṃ ceti. tatredam dvayor api sādhāraṇaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ pratipāditaṃ. samarthanaṃ punar avipratārakavacanaprabhavasyehādivākyaprastāva eva laukikasya vihitaṃ,
GSP29snyayvpu:566: śāstrajasya tu vidhātavyam iti yādṛśaḥ śāstrāt tajjātaṃ pramāṇatām anubhavati tad darśayati:
GSP29snyayvpu:569: [NAV_9.1] śāsti śikṣayati jīvājīvāditattvaṃ grāhayati, śiṣyate 'neneti vā
GSP29snyayvpu:570: śāstram. tat kiṃbhūtam iti tadviśeṣaṇāny āha. āptaḥ
GSP29snyayvpu:573: vacanānupalabdher, upalambhe 'pi tadarthānavagamāt, tadarthaniścayārthaṃ puruṣāśrayaṇe gajasnānanyāyaprasaṅgāt, tasya rāgādikaluṣitatvena vitathārthakathanapravṛtteḥ. tadanuṣṭhānād api svakāryasiddhau
GSP29snyayvpu:574: praṇayanārtham api puruṣaḥ kiṃ neṣyate, viśeṣābhāvāt. tan na kṣīṇadoṣavacanaṃ vyatiricyānyataḥ prekṣāvatāṃ paralokādāv adṛṣṭe 'rthe
GSP29snyayvpu:575: pravṛttir yuktā; tat tad eva śāstraṃ, nirupacaritaśabdārthopapatter ity āstāṃ tāvat.
GSP29snyayvpu:576: [NAV_9.2] ata evollaṅghyate prābalyena gamyate 'bhibhūyate anyair ity ullaṅghyaṃ, tato 'nyad anullaṅghyaṃ, sarvavacanātiśāyīti yāvat. ata eva dṛṣṭena pramāṇanirṇīteneṣṭasya tadvācyasya virodho yasmiṃs tattathā tad
GSP29snyayvpu:577: eva, yadi vā dṛṣṭaḥ pramāṇena, iṣṭo vacanāntareṇa, tayor virodhakaṃ,
GSP29snyayvpu:580: [NAV_9.3] tadiyatā śāstrasya svārthasampad uktā. adhunā tattvopadeśādīnāṃ parārthatvāt parārthasampadam āha: tattvaṃ jīvādayaḥ padārthāḥ,
GSP29snyayvpu:582: tadrakṣaṇādividhānaṃ vā. taṃ karoti tattvopadeśakṛt. ata eva sārvaṃ
GSP29snyayvpu:585: [NAV_9.4] adhunā pareṣām evānarthavighātitvam āha: kutsitāḥ panthāḥ kāpathās tīrthāntarāṇi, teṣāṃ ghaṭṭanaṃ vicālakaṃ nirākārakaṃ,
GSP29snyayvpu:586: sarvajanāpakārikumatavidhvaṃsakam ity arthaḥ. īdṛśād eva śāstrāj jātaṃ śābdaṃ pramāṇaṃ, nānyebhyo, vipralambhakatvāt teṣām iti.
GSP29snyayvpu:587: [NAV_10.0] adhunā parārthānumānalakṣaṇaṃ vaktavyam, tac ca pratyakṣe 'pi
GSP29snyayvpu:590: parārthaṃ mānam ākhyātaṃ vākyaṃ tadupacārataḥ // NA_10 //
GSP29snyayvpu:591: [NAV_10.1] atra parārthaṃ mānam iti lakṣyaṃ, svaniścayavad ityādi lakṣaṇam. sva ātmā tasya niścayaḥ prameyādhigamas, tadvad anyeśāṃ pratipādyānāṃ niścayotpādanaṃ prameyaparicchedakajñānaprādurbhāvanaṃ:
GSP29snyayvpu:592: yathātmano 'rthanirṇayas tathā pareṣāṃ nirṇayajananam ity arthaḥ. budhair
GSP29snyayvpu:593: vidvadbhiḥ, parasmai arthaḥ prayojanaṃ yena tat parārthaṃ, mīyate 'neneti
GSP29snyayvpu:595: [NAV_10.2] nanu ca yadi niścayotpādanaṃ parārthamānaṃ, tathā jñānam api
GSP29snyayvpu:596: parapratyāyanāya vyāpriyamānaṃ parārthaṃ prāpnotīty āha: vākyaṃ parārthaṃ,
GSP29snyayvpu:597: na jñānaṃ, tasyāivānantaryeṇa vyāpārāt, paraprayojanamātratvāc ca,
GSP29snyayvpu:598: itarasya tu vyavahitatvāt, svaparopakāritvāc ca. kathaṃ vacanam ajñānarūpaṃ pramāṇam ity āha: tadupacāratas, tasya jñānasyopacāro 'tadrūpasyāpi tadaṅgatayā tadrūpatvena grahaṇam, tataḥ. idam uktaṃ bhavati: pratipādyagatam utpatsyamānaṃ yaj jñānaṃ tad avyavahitakāraṇatvād
GSP29snyayvpu:599: vacanam apy upacāreṇa pramāṇam ity ucyate. tatrānumānasya pārārthyaṃ parair abhyupagatam eva, pratyakṣasya na pratipadyante, kiledaṃ śabdapraveśaśūnyasvalakṣaṇagrāhīti nāitadgocaraḥ parebhyaḥ pratipādayituṃ pāryate. na ca śabdāt parasya svalakṣaṇagrahaṇadakṣaṃ pratyakṣam
GSP29snyayvpu:603: kāryakāraṇatā teṣāṃ nārthaṃ śabdāḥ spṛśanty api" //
GSP29snyayvpu:604: [NAV_11.0] nirvikalpakaṃ ca pratyakṣam, ato na śabdajanyam ity ato 'numānaṃ dṛṣṭāntīkṛtya pratyakṣasyāpi parārthatāṃ sādhayitum āha:
GSP29snyayvpu:606: parasya tadupāyatvāt parārthatvaṃ dvayor api // NA_11 //
GSP29snyayvpu:608: svapratītaprameyapratyāyakatvāt parārthatvaṃ pratipādyaprayojanatvaṃ dvayor api pratyakṣānumānayos, tulyakāraṇatvān, nānumānasyāivāikasyety
GSP29snyayvpu:609: abhiprāyaḥ. iha cāśrūyamāṇatvāt tadarthagamanāc cāpīvaśabdau luptanirdiṣṭau draṣṭavyau. pratyakṣapratītārthapratyāyanaṃ ca pratijānānasyāyam abhiprāyo: yat paro manyate -- nāitadgocaraṃ parebhyaḥ pratipādayituṃ pāryata iti -- tad ayuktaṃ, nirvikalpakādhyakṣāpohena vyavasāyarūpasya pratyakṣasya prāg eva sādhitatvāt, tadgocarasya kathañcid vikalpagamyatvena śabdapratipādyatvāt. tad yathānumānapratīto 'rthaḥ
GSP29snyayvpu:610: parasmai pratipādyamāno vacanarūpāpannaḥ parārtham anumānaṃ, tathā pratyakṣapratīto 'pi parārthaṃ pratyakṣaṃ, parapratyāyanasya tulyatvād,
GSP29snyayvpu:611: vacanavyāpārasyāiva bhedāt. tathā hy: anumānapratītaṃ pratyāyayann evaṃ
GSP29snyayvpu:612: vacanayaty -- agnir atra dhūmād, yatra yatra dhūmas tatra tatrāgnir, yathā
GSP29snyayvpu:613: mahānasādau; vaidharmyeṇa vāgnyabhāve na kvacid dhūmo, yathā jalāśayādau,
GSP29snyayvpu:614: tathā ca dhūmo 'yaṃ, tasmād dhūmād agnir atreti,
GSP29snyayvpu:616: smaryamāṇe sambandhe punar evam: agnir atra dhūmopapatter; vaidharmyeṇa:
GSP29snyayvpu:617: agnir atra, anyathā dhūmānupapatteḥ. pratyakṣapratītaṃ punar darśayann
GSP29snyayvpu:618: etāvad vakti: ‘paśya rāja gacchati'. tataś ca vacanād dvividhād api samagrasāmagrīkasya pratipādyasyānumeyapratyakṣārthaviṣayā yataḥ pratītir
GSP29snyayvpu:619: ullasaty, ato dvayor api parārthatety āha: parasya tadupāyatvāt pratipādyasya pratītiṃ
GSP29snyayvpu:622: [NAV_11.2] yac coktaṃ: ‘na śabdāt parasya pratyakṣotpattis, tasya
GSP29snyayvpu:625: kathañcid ekaviṣayatayā śabdotpādyatvāvirodhād, evaṃvidhasya ca prāg eva
GSP29snyayvpu:626: samarthanāt. cakṣurādisāmagrītas tad utpadyate, na śabdād iti ced,
GSP29snyayvpu:627: anumānam api pratyakṣādiniścitād dhetor avismṛtasambandhasya pramātur
GSP29snyayvpu:628: ullasati, na śabdād, atas tasyāpi parārthatā viśīryeta.
GSP29snyayvpu:629: samarthahetukathanāt tatra vacanasya parārthateti ced, atrāpi darśanayogyārthapratipādanād iti brūmaḥ. tan na pratyakṣaparokṣayoḥ
GSP29snyayvpu:630: pārārthyaṃ prati viśeṣopalabdhir iti mucyatāṃ pakṣapātaḥ.
GSP29snyayvpu:631: [NAV_12.0] tad evaṃ dvayor api parārthatāṃ pratipādya tatsvarūpam āha:
GSP29snyayvpu:633: pratyakṣaṃ pratibhāsasya nimittatvāt tad ucyate // NA_12 //
GSP29snyayvpu:635: sākṣātkārijñānagocarakathanacaturaṃ tat pratyakṣam ucyata iti sambandhaḥ.
GSP29snyayvpu:636: tac ca pratyakṣarūpam evocyamānaṃ pratyakṣaṃ, vipratipannaṃ prati punar
GSP29snyayvpu:638: vacanaṃ kutaḥ pratyakṣam ity āha: pratibhāsasya nimittatvāt pratipādyapratyakṣaprakāśahetutvād upacāreṇocyata ity arthaḥ.
GSP29snyayvpu:642: [NAV_13.1] hinoti gamayaty artham iti hetus, tasya sādhyāvinābhuvaḥ prāṅ
GSP29snyayvpu:643: nirūpitasya yad vacaḥ pratipādakaṃ sandarśakaṃ tad anumānaprakāśahetutvāt parārtham anumānam. tat kīdṛśaṃ? ity āha: pakṣo vakṣyamāṇalakṣaṇaḥ sa ādir yeṣāṃ hetudṛṣṭāntopanayanigamanādīnāṃ tāni tathā, teṣāṃ vacanāni pratipādakā dhvanayaḥ; tāny evātmā svarūpaṃ yasya tat pakṣādivacanātmakam.
GSP29snyayvpu:644: [NAV_13.2] nanu ca hetupratipādakaṃ vacaḥ parārtham anumānam ity abhidhāya tat pakṣādivacanātmakam iti vadataḥ pūrvāparavyāhatā vāco yuktiḥ. nāitad
GSP29snyayvpu:645: asty; evaṃ manyate nāikaḥ prakāraḥ parārthānumānasya, kiṃ tarhi yathā
GSP29snyayvpu:646: parasya sukhena prameyapratītir bhavati tathā yatnataḥ pratyāyanīyaḥ.
GSP29snyayvpu:647: tatra daśāvayavaṃ sādhanaṃ pratipādanopāyaḥ. tad yathā -- pakṣādayaḥ
GSP29snyayvpu:648: pañca, tacchuddhayaś ca. tatra yadā pratipādyaḥ prakramād eva nirṇītapakṣo
GSP29snyayvpu:649: 'vismṛtadṛṣṭāntasmāryapratibandhagrāhakapramāṇo vyutpannamatitvāc cheṣāvayavābhyūhanasamarthaś ca bhavati, yad vātyantābhyāsena parikarmitamatitvāt tāvatāiva prastutaprameyam avabudhyate, tadā hetupratipādanam eva kriyate, śeṣābhidhānasya śrotṛsaṃskārākāritayā nairarthakyād ityādau hetupratipādanaṃ sūtrakṛtā parārtham anumānam uktam.
GSP29snyayvpu:650: yadā tu pratipādyasya nādyāpi pakṣanirṇayas, tadākāṇḍa eva hetūpanyāso
GSP29snyayvpu:651: 'dṛṣṭamudgarapātāyamānaḥ syād iti pakṣo 'pi nirdiśyate. tathāsmaryamāṇe pratibandhagrāhiṇi pramāṇe dṛṣṭānto 'pi varṇyetānyathā hetoḥ sāmarthyānavagateḥ. smṛte 'pi pramāṇe dārṣṭāntike yojayitum
GSP29snyayvpu:652: ajānānasyopanayo darśyate. tathāpi sākāṅkṣasya nigamanam ucyate, 'nyathā
GSP29snyayvpu:653: nirākulaprastutārthāsiddheḥ. tathā yatra pakṣādau svarūpavipratipattis tatra tacchuddhiḥ pramāṇena kartavyetarathā teṣāṃ svasādhyāsādhanāt.
GSP29snyayvpu:655: [NAV_13.3] nanu ca svaniścayavat paraniścayotpādanaṃ parārtham anumānam
GSP29snyayvpu:656: uktaṃ, na ca svārthānumānakāle kramo 'yam anubhūyate, sambandhavedino hetudarśanamātrāt sādhyapratītisiddher, na hi pratipattā pakṣaṃ kṛtvā tato
GSP29snyayvpu:657: hetuṃ nibhālayati, nāpi dṛṣṭāntādikaṃ viracayati, tathā pratīter abhāvāt.
GSP29snyayvpu:658: kiṃ cānvayavyatirekābhyāṃ hetor eva sāmarthyam unnīyate, na pakṣādīnāṃ,
GSP29snyayvpu:660: 'navasthāprasaṅgāt. yadi ca tatsāmarthyaṃ syāt, tadā pakṣopanyāsamātrād eva sādhyāvagater hetur ānarthakyam aśnuvīta, uttarāvayavāś ca, evaṃ hi tatsāmarthyaṃ siddhyen nānyathā. tasmād ya eva paranirapekṣaṃ sādhyaṃ bodhayati sa eva hetuḥ sādhanaṃ, na pakṣādaya iti.
GSP29snyayvpu:661: [NAV_13.4] atrocyate -- ‘svaniścayavat paraniścayotpādanaṃ parārtham anumānam uktam'; ityādi yad uktaṃ tad yuktam uktaṃ, kevalaṃ tadarthaṃ na
GSP29snyayvpu:662: jānīṣe, niścayāpekṣayāiva ‘vat'inā tulyatābhidhānān; na punaḥ sarvasāmānyam abhipretam, anyathā dhvanim anuccārayan svārthānumāne sādhyam avabudhyata iti, tadanuccāraṇena paraniścayotpādanaṃ prasajyeta.
GSP29snyayvpu:663: na cāitad asti, śabdānuccāraṇe parapratipādanāsambhavāt, tadarthaṃ śabdāṅgīkaraṇe yena yena vinā parapratipādanāsambhavas tat tad urarīkartavyaṃ, samānanyāyāt. na ca pakṣādivirahe pratipādyaviśeṣaḥ pratipādayituṃ śakyo, hetugocarāditatsādhyārthapratītivikalatayā tasya sākāṅkṣatvāt. tathā ca bubhutsitārthabodhābhāvād apratyāyita eva tiṣṭhed;
GSP29snyayvpu:664: atas tadbodhanārthaṃ pakṣādayo darśanīyā iti te 'pi sādhanāṃśāḥ syuḥ. yac
GSP29snyayvpu:665: coktam: anvayavyatirekānukaraṇābhāvān na sādhanaṃ, hetumātrād api sādhyasiddhes, tad ayuktam, avipratārakatāniścitapuruṣavacanamātrād apy agnir atretyādirūpāt kvacit prameyo 'rthaḥ sidhyatīti hetor apy
GSP29snyayvpu:667: avipratārakavacanasya prāg eva prāmāṇyaprasādhanāt. yac coktam: yady amīṣāṃ sāmarthyaṃ syāt, tadā pakṣamātrād eva sādhyapratīter hetor vaiyarthyaṃ syād iti, tad ayuktataraṃ, bhavatpakṣe 'pi samānatvāt, tatrāpi samarthahetūpanyāsād eva sādhyāvagater, anyathā samarthatāyogāt. paścāt tasyāiva pramāṇena samarthanaṃ sarvatra gṛhītavyāptikasya ca punaḥ pakṣadharmiṇy upasaṃharaṇam anarthakatāṃ prāpnuvat kena nivāryeta?
GSP29snyayvpu:668: tadabhāve hetoḥ sāmarthyaṃ nāvagamyate, tena sārthakam iti cet, pakṣādīn api virahayya pratipādyaviśeṣaḥ pratipādayituṃ na pāryata iti teṣām api sārthakatā na durupapādeti mucyatām āgrahaḥ. tasmād dhetuvat pakṣādayo 'pi
GSP29snyayvpu:669: sādhanaṃ, hetor api kvacit pratipādye tadapekṣatayā nirapekṣatāsiddher
GSP29snyayvpu:670: iti. tad idaṃ sakalam ākalayyoktaṃ tat pakṣādivacanātmakaṃ iti.
GSP29snyayvpu:671: [NAV_14.0] tad evam arthataḥ pakṣādīn prastutya tāvat pakṣalakṣaṇam āha:
GSP29snyayvpu:674: [NAV_14.1] pacyata iti pakṣo, vyaktīkriyata itibhāvaḥ. kiṃbhūta ity āha:
GSP29snyayvpu:675: sādhyasyānumeyasyābhyupagamo 'ṅgīkaraṇaṃ, prāśnikādīnāṃ purataḥ pratijñāsvīkāra ity arthaḥ. kim abhyupagamamātram? nety āha:
GSP29snyayvpu:676: pratyakṣādyanirākṛta iti. pratyakṣaṃ sākṣātkāri saṃvedanam, ādiśabdād anumānasvavacanalokā gṛhyante, tair anirākṛto 'bādhitaḥ pakṣa iti sambandhaḥ. tad yathā -- ‘sarvam anekāntātmakam', ‘asti sarvajña'; ityādi
GSP29snyayvpu:677: vā. ayaṃ ca kevalam eṣṭavyo, na punaḥ parārthānumānakāle
GSP29snyayvpu:678: vacanenābhidhātavya iti yo manyeta taṃ pratyāha: tasya pakṣasya prayogo
GSP29snyayvpu:679: 'bhidhānam atra parārthānumānaprastāve kartavyo vidheyaḥ. kuta ity āha:
GSP29snyayvpu:680: hetoḥ prāṅnirūpitasya gocaradīpaka iti, ‘nimittakāraṇahetuṣu sarvāsāṃ prāyo darśanam'; itivacanād, bhāvapradhānatvāc ca nirdeśasya,
GSP29snyayvpu:681: viṣayasandarśakatvād ity arthaḥ. ayam atrābhiprāyo: na hi sarvatra
GSP29snyayvpu:682: prativādinaḥ prakramād eva nirṇītapakṣasya kūrcaśobhāpuraḥsaraṃ hetur
GSP29snyayvpu:684: [NAV_15.0] tato yadādyāpi pratipādyaḥ pakṣārthaṃ na jānīte, tadākāṇḍa eva hetāv ucyamāne viṣayavyāmohād bhrāntilakṣaṇo doṣaḥ syād ity āha:
GSP29snyayvpu:686: pratyāyyasya bhaved dhetur viruddhārekito yathā // NA_15 //
GSP29snyayvpu:688: vādino hetūpanyāsakartur abhipreto 'bhimataḥ sa cāsau hetugocaraś ca
GSP29snyayvpu:689: vādyabhipretahetugocaras; tatra muhyati dolāyate tac chīlaś ca yas, tasya pratyāyyasya prativādino hetur viruddhārekito bhaved
GSP29snyayvpu:690: virodhaśaṅkākalaṅkitaḥ syād ity arthaḥ. tataś ca samyagghetāv api ‘vipakṣa
GSP29snyayvpu:691: evāyaṃ vartata'; iti vyāmohād viruddhadūṣaṇam abhidadhīta, pakṣopanyāsāt tu nirṇītahetugocarasya nāiṣa doṣaḥ syād ity abhiprāyaḥ. amum evārthaṃ spaṣṭadṛṣṭāntenāha yatheti. tadupanyāsārthaḥ.
GSP29snyayvpu:694: [NAV_16.1] yathā lakṣyanirdeśaṃ vinā dhānuṣkasyeṣuṃ prakṣipato yau
GSP29snyayvpu:695: guṇadoṣau tau taddarśijanasya viparyastāv api pratibhātaḥ -- guṇo 'pi
GSP29snyayvpu:696: doṣatayā, doṣo 'pi vā guṇatayā -- tathā pakṣanirdeśaṃ vinā hetum upanyasyato vādino yau svābhipretasādhyasādhanasamarthatvāsamarthatvalakṣaṇau guṇadoṣau tau prāśnikaprativādyādīnāṃ viparītāv api pratibhāta iti bhāvārthaḥ.
GSP29snyayvpu:697: akṣarārthas tu dhanuṣā carati dhānuṣkas tasya guṇo lakṣyavedhaprāvīṇyalakṣaṇas tatra prekṣakāṇāṃ kutūhalam iti
GSP29snyayvpu:698: tasyāivopādānam, anyathā doṣo 'pi draṣṭavyaḥ. tatsamprekṣijanasya tatsamprekṣaṇaśīlalokasya parividhyato yathā -- kathañcid bāṇaṃ muñcata
GSP29snyayvpu:699: ity arthaḥ; dhanuṣkasya vinā lakṣyanirdeśena cāpadharasya vedhyaniṣṭaṅkanam ṛte yau guṇetarau guṇadoṣau tau yathā viruddhārekitau
GSP29snyayvpu:700: bhavatas, tathā vādino 'pīty arthaḥ. tasmād avijñātatadarthe prativādini
GSP29snyayvpu:701: vādidhānuṣkeṇa pakṣalakṣyaṃ nirdiśyāiva hetuśaraḥ proktavya iti sthitam.
GSP29snyayvpu:702: [NAV_17.0] sāmprataṃ hetor lakṣaṇāvasaras, tac ca svārthānumānavan
GSP29snyayvpu:703: nirviśeṣaṃ draṣṭavyaṃ; prayogas tu tatra na darśitaḥ, svārthānumānasya
GSP29snyayvpu:704: bodharūpatvād; iha tu darśanīyaḥ, parārthānumānasya vacanarūpatvād; atas taṃ darśayati:
GSP29snyayvpu:705: hetos tathopapattyā vā syāt prayogo 'nyathāpi vā /
GSP29snyayvpu:708: sādhyavyatirekāt sāmastyena hetor vyāvṛttir evāikaṃ lakṣaṇam iti nirṇītam.
GSP29snyayvpu:709: parārthānumāne 'pi tad eva prakāśanīyaṃ, vacanaracanā tu kvacit kathañcit pravartata ity abhiprāyavāṃs taddvaividhyam āha: hetor dvividhaḥ prayogaḥ
GSP29snyayvpu:710: syād iti sambandhaḥ. katham ity āha: tathāiva sādhyasadbhāva evopapattir
GSP29snyayvpu:711: vidyamānatā, tayā tathopapattyā, yathāgnir atra, dhūmasya tathāivopapatter iti. anyathāpi vety anenāvayave samudāyopacārād anyathānupapattiṃ lakṣayati. anyathā sādhyavyatireke 'nupapattir avidyamānatāiva tayā vānyathānupapattyā hetoḥ prayogaḥ syād, yathāgnir atra,
GSP29snyayvpu:712: dhūmasyānyathānupapatter iti. ‘ete ca dve apy ekasmin sādhye prayoktavye';
GSP29snyayvpu:713: iti yo manyeta,tacchiṣyaṇārthaṃ āhānyatareṇāpi tathopapattiprayogeṇānyathānupapattiprayogeṇa vā sādhyasya pratipipādayiṣitārthasya siddhir niṣpattiḥ pratipādyapratītāv ārohaṇaṃ
GSP29snyayvpu:714: bhaved, iti yasmāt, tasmān na dve api prayoktavye, prayogadvaye 'pi yasmād vacanaracanā bhidyate, nārthaḥ; prayogasya ca sādhyasādhanaṃ phalaṃ; tac ced ekenāiva sidhyati, dvitīyaprayogaḥ kevalaṃ vaktur akauśalamācakṣīta,
GSP29snyayvpu:716: [NAV_18.0] adhunā dṛṣṭāntalakṣaṇāvasaraḥ. sa ca dvedhā: sādharmyeṇa vaidharmyeṇa ca. tatra sādharmyadṛṣṭāntam adhikṛtyāha:
GSP29snyayvpu:718: sādharmyeṇa sa dṛṣṭāntaḥ sambandhasmaraṇān mataḥ // NA_18 //
GSP29snyayvpu:719: [NAV_18.1] dṛṣṭayor avalokitayoḥ sāmarthyāt sādhyasādhanayor antaḥ pariniṣṭhitiḥ anvayād vyatirekād vā sādhyasādhanabhāvavyavasthitinibandhanāsminn iti dṛṣṭāntaḥ; samāno dharmo 'syeti sadharmā tadbhāvaḥ sādharmyaṃ tena sādharmyeṇa. sa kiṃvidho bhavatīty āha: sādhyaṃ jijñāsitārthātmakaṃ, sādhanaṃ tadgamako hetuḥ,
GSP29snyayvpu:720: tayoḥ sādhyasādhanayor vyāptir, idam anena vinā na bhavatītyevaṃrūpā,
GSP29snyayvpu:721: yatra kvacin niścīyatetarāṃ atiśayena nirṇīyate sa sādharmyadṛṣṭāntaḥ.
GSP29snyayvpu:722: yathāgnir atra, dhūmasya tathāivopapatter, mahānasādivad iti. ayaṃ cāvismṛtapratibandhe prativādini na prayoktavya ity āha: sambandhasmaraṇād
GSP29snyayvpu:723: iti, lyablope pañcamī, prāggṛhītavismṛtasambandhasmaraṇam adhikṛtya mato
GSP29snyayvpu:724: 'bhipreto 'yaṃ nītividām, nānyadā. yadā hi pratipādyo 'dyāpi sambandhaṃ sādhyāvinābhāvitvalakṣaṇaṃ nāvabudhyate, tadā pramāṇena sambandhaṃ
GSP29snyayvpu:725: grāhaṇīyo, na dṛṣṭāntamātreṇa, na hi sahadarśanād eva kvacit sarvatredam
GSP29snyayvpu:726: amunā vinā na bhavatīti sidhyaty, atiprasaṅgāt. gṛhīte ca pratibandhe
GSP29snyayvpu:727: smaryamāṇe kevalaṃ hetur darśanīyaḥ, tāvatāiva bubhutsitārthasiddher dṛṣṭānto na vācyo, vaiyarthyāt. yadā tu gṛhīto 'pi vismṛtaḥ kathañcit sambandhas, tadā tatsmaraṇārthaṃ dṛṣṭāntaḥ kathyate.
GSP29snyayvpu:728: [NAV_18.2] nanu ca kathaṃ trikālasamastadeśavyāpisambandhāvagatiḥ? na tāvan nirṇayātmakam api pratyakṣaṃ deśakālāntarasaṃcariṣṇunoḥ
GSP29snyayvpu:730: viśadādhyavasāyena pravṛtteḥ. nāpi śabdāt tannirṇayas, tasya paropadeśarūpatayā svārthānumānābhāvaprasaṅgāt, tatra paropadeśābhāvāt,
GSP29snyayvpu:731: tadabhāve sambandhāsiddes, tadasiddhāv anumānānutthānād iti. anumānāt sambandhagrahaṇe niravadhir anavasthānuṣajyeta, sambandhagrāhiṇo 'py
GSP29snyayvpu:733: pratyakṣānumāne dve eva pramāṇe iti yeṣāṃ mithyābhiniveśas, teṣāṃ eṣa doṣo
GSP29snyayvpu:737: atra prakaraṇe punar anumānāt pārthakyenoho na darśitaḥ,
GSP29snyayvpu:738: saṅkṣiptarucisattvānugrahapravṛttatvād asya, śābdaṃ tu pṛthak samarthitaṃ,
GSP29snyayvpu:742: khyāpyate yatra dṛṣṭānte vaidharmyeṇeti sa smṛtaḥ // NA_19 //
GSP29snyayvpu:743: [NAV_19.1] visadṛśo dharmo 'syeti vidharmā, tadbhāvo vaidharmyaṃ, tena vaidharmyeṇa dṛṣṭāntaḥ. kīdṛśa ity āha: sādhye gamye nivartamāne
GSP29snyayvpu:745: gamakasyāpy asambhava evety atra draṣṭavyaḥ, khyāpyate pratipādyate yatra
GSP29snyayvpu:746: kvacid dṛṣṭānte sa vaidharmyeṇa bhavatītiśabdena sambandhasmaraṇād iti.
GSP29snyayvpu:747: [NAV_20.0] idam atrāpi sambadhnāti: asyāpi smaryamāṇe sambandhe
GSP29snyayvpu:748: prayogāyogād iti kim arthaṃ vismṛtasambandha eva prativādini dṛṣṭāntaḥ prayujyate, nānyadeti paravacanāvakāśam āśaṅkyāha:
GSP29snyayvpu:750: vyarthā syāt tadasadbhāve 'py evaṃ nyāyavido viduḥ // NA_20 //
GSP29snyayvpu:751: [NAV_20.1] anyadāhi smaryamāṇe vā sambandhe prayujyetāgṛhīte vā. yady ādyaḥ pakṣaḥ, so 'yuktaḥ. yadā sarvatra sādhyāvinābhāvinaṃ hetuṃ smarati pratipādyas, tadā pakṣe 'pi tam avabudhya kathaṃ sādhyaṃ na pratipadyeta?
GSP29snyayvpu:752: tataś cāntaḥ pakṣamadhye vyāptiḥ sādhanasya sādhyākrāntatvam antarvyāptis,
GSP29snyayvpu:753: tayāiva sādhyasya gamyasya siddheḥ pratīter bahir vivakṣitadharmiṇo
GSP29snyayvpu:755: tatpratyāyyārthābhāvād iti. dvitīyapakṣasyāpi nirdoṣatāṃ nirasyann āha:
GSP29snyayvpu:756: tadasadbhāve 'py evaṃ sambandhāgrahaṇād antarvyāptyabhāve 'py evam iti vyarthāiva bahirudāhṛtiḥ. na hi sahadarśanāt kvacit sarvatra tadrūpatā
GSP29snyayvpu:757: sidhyati, vyabhicāradarśanāt. tasmād agṛhītasambandhe pratipādye pramāṇena pratibandhaḥ sādhyaḥ. tatsiddhau tata eva sādhyasiddher akiñcitkarī dṛṣṭāntodāhṛtir iti nyāyavido nyāyavidvāṃso vidur avabudhyanta iti. iha ca prakaraṇe śeṣāvayavānām upanayanigamanaśuddhipañcakalakṣaṇānāṃ
GSP29snyayvpu:758: saṅkṣiptarucisattvānugrahaparatvād asya, yady api sākṣāl lakṣaṇaṃ noktaṃ,
GSP29snyayvpu:759: tathāpy ata eva pratipāditāvayavatrayād buddhimadbhir unneyaṃ; yato
GSP29snyayvpu:760: 'vayavāpekṣayā jaghanyamadhyamotkṛṣṭās tisraḥ kathā bhavanti. tatra hetupratipādanamātraṃ jaghanyā. dvyādyavayavanivedanaṃ madhyamā.
GSP29snyayvpu:761: sampūrṇadaśāvayavakathanam utkṛṣṭā. tatreha madhyamāyāḥ sākṣāt kathanena jaghanyotkṛṣṭe arthataḥ sūcayati, tadsadbhāvasya pramāṇasiddhatvād iti.
GSP29snyayvpu:762: [NAV_21.0] evaṃ pakṣādilakṣaṇaṃ pratipādyedānīṃ heyajñāne saty upādeyaṃ
GSP29snyayvpu:763: viviktataraṃ vedyata iti tadvyudastāḥ pakṣahetudṛṣṭāntābhāsā vaktavyāḥ.
GSP29snyayvpu:767: [NAV_21.1] pakṣasthānopanyastatvāt tatkāryākaraṇatvāc ca pakṣavad ābhāsata iti pakṣābhāsaḥ. asāv anekadhānekaprakāro mata iti sambandhaḥ. katham ity āha: pratipādyasya prativādino yaḥ kaścit siddhaḥ pratītāv ārūḍha eva sa
GSP29snyayvpu:769: atiprasakteḥ. tathākṣaliṅgato 'dhyakṣahetubhyāṃ lokasvavacanābhyāṃ ca bādhitas tiraskṛto yaḥ sa pakṣābhāsaḥ. tatra pratipādyasiddho yathā:
GSP29snyayvpu:770: paudgaliko ghaṭaḥ, saugataṃ vā prati: sarvaṃ kṣaṇikam ityādi.
GSP29snyayvpu:771: pratyakṣabādhito yathā: niraṃśāni svalakṣaṇāni, parasparaviviktau vā sāmānyaviśeṣāv iti. anumānabādhito yathā: nāsti sarvajña iti. lokabādhito
GSP29snyayvpu:772: yathā: gamyā mātā iti. svavacanabādhito yathā: na santi sarve bhāvā iti.
GSP29snyayvpu:773: [NAV_22.0] sāmprataṃ hetulakṣaṇaṃ smārayaṃs tadapāstān hetvābhāsān āha:
GSP29snyayvpu:776: [NAV_22.1] hetor lakṣaṇam asādhāraṇadharmarūpaṃ yad īritaṃ gamitam
GSP29snyayvpu:777: anekārthatvād vā pratipāditaṃ svārthānumānaprastāve yad utānyathānupapannatvam iti tasyāpratītir anadhyavasāyaḥ, sandeho
GSP29snyayvpu:778: dolāyamānatā, viparyāso vaiparītyanirṇayo; 'pratītiś ca sandehaś ca
GSP29snyayvpu:779: viparyāsaś ceti dvandvaḥ; paścāt tadā saha tatpuruṣas: tais
GSP29snyayvpu:780: tadapratītisandehaviparyāsais; tadābhatāābhānam ābhā tasyeva samyagghetor ivābhāsyeti tadābhas, tadbhāvas tattā, hetvābhāsatā bhavatīty arthaḥ.
GSP29snyayvpu:781: [NAV_23.0] adhunā yena lakṣaṇena yannāmā hetvābhāso bhavati tad darśayati:
GSP29snyayvpu:783: viruddho yo 'nyathāpy atra yukto 'naikāntikaḥ sa tu // NA_23 //
GSP29snyayvpu:784: [NAV_23.1] yaḥ kaścid apratītaḥ pratītyā agocarīkṛto 'niścitaḥ so
GSP29snyayvpu:785: 'siddhanāmā hetvābhāsaḥ. tuśabdas trayasyāpi bhedoddyotakaḥ. yas tv anyathāiva sādhyaṃ vināiva vipakṣa eveti yāvad, upapadyate sambhavati sa
GSP29snyayvpu:786: viruddhābhidhānaḥ. yaḥ punar anyathāpi sādhyaviparyayeṇāpi yukto ghaṭamānako, 'piśabdāt sādhyenāpi, so 'tra vyatikare 'naikāntikasaṃjño
GSP29snyayvpu:787: jñātavya iti. tatra pratiprāṇiprasiddhapramāṇapratiṣṭhitānekāntaviruddhabuddhibhiḥ kaṇabhakṣākṣapādabuddhādiśiṣyakair upanyasyamānāḥ sarva eva hetavaḥ, tad yathāikāntenānityaḥ śabdo nityo vā, sattvād, utpattimattvāt, kṛtakatvāt,
GSP29snyayvpu:789: [NAV_23.2] tathā hy: anityāikānte tāvad asiddhāḥ sarva eva hetavaś,
GSP29snyayvpu:791: asadādivyavacchedenālīkasaṃvṛtivikalpitatvāt, pāramārthikatve tv ekasyānekarūpāpattyānekāntavādāpatteḥ, kalpanāracitasattākānāṃ ca sarvaśaktiviraharūpatayā niḥsvabhāvatvāt, tathāpi teṣāṃ sādhanatve sādhyam api niḥsvabhāvam iti kharaviṣāṇaṃ śaśaviṣāṇasya sādhanam āpadyata iti
GSP29snyayvpu:793: buddhyārūḍhena dharmadharminyāyena na bahiḥsadasattvam apekṣate, tenāyam adoṣa iti ced, evaṃ tarhi cākṣuṣatvam api śabde buddhyādhyāropya
GSP29snyayvpu:795: acākṣuṣatvavyavacchedena cākṣuṣatvaṃ buddhyādhyāropayituṃpāryate, na yathā kathañcin, na cāsau śabde 'sty, acakṣurgrāhyatvāt tasya, tenāyam adoṣa iti
GSP29snyayvpu:796: cet, ko 'yam acākṣuṣatvavyavacchedo nāma: vyavacchedamātraṃ nīrūpaṃ,
GSP29snyayvpu:797: vyavacchinnaṃ vā svalakṣaṇaṃ, vyavacchedikā vā buddhiḥ svāṃśamagnāpi bahirvastugrahaṇarūpatayā plavamānā? nāparo vastudharmo yatra
GSP29snyayvpu:798: bhedābhedavikalpadvāreṇā dūṣaṇaṃ ditsur bhavān iti cet, tarhi sa śabde
GSP29snyayvpu:799: nāstīti kāiṣā bhāṣā? evaṃ hi nabhaḥpuṇḍarīkaṃ tatra nāstīti sattvādikam
GSP29snyayvpu:800: api kalpayituṃ na śakyam iti prasajyeta. kiṃ ca, te sādhanadharmā dharmiṇi
GSP29snyayvpu:801: bhavanto 'pi na bhavaddarśane pratītim ārohanti, pratyakṣasya vikalpavikalatayā dharmanirṇayaśūnyatvāt, taduttarakālabhāvinyā vāsanāprabodhajanyāyā vikalpabuddheḥ svāṃśagrahaṇaparyavasitaśarīratvena bahiḥsvalakṣaṇe praveśābhāvāt, tataś cāpratītatvāt sarvasyāsiddhatvam.
GSP29snyayvpu:802: [NAV_23.3] nityāikānte 'pi dharmiṇo 'tyantavyatiriktānām apāramārthikānāṃ vā svasādhanadharmāṇāṃ pramāṇenāpratītatvād asiddhatā draṣṭavyā, dharmiṇo
GSP29snyayvpu:803: 'vinirluṭhitarūpāṇāṃ pāramārthikānāṃ sakaladharmāṇāṃ pratyakṣādipramāṇaprasiddhatvena nihnotum aśakyatvād iti.
GSP29snyayvpu:804: [NAV_23.4] tathā viruddhatāpi pakṣadvaye 'pi sarvasādhanadharmāṇām unneyānekāntapratibaddhasvabhāvatvena tatsādhanapravaṇatvāt. etac cottaratra vakṣyāmaḥ.
GSP29snyayvpu:805: [NAV_23.5] evaṃ pakṣadvaye 'pi nirdiśyamānāḥ sarva eva hetavo
GSP29snyayvpu:808: [NAV_23.6] tathā hi: anityavādī nityavādinaṃ prati pramāṇayati. sarvaṃ
GSP29snyayvpu:810: arthakriyākāritvasya ca bhāvalakṣaṇatvāt, tato 'rthakriyā vyāvartamānā svakroḍīkṛtāṃ sattāṃ vyāvartayed iti kṣaṇikatvasiddhiḥ. na hi nityo 'rtho
GSP29snyayvpu:814: atādavasthyasyānityalakṣaṇatvāt. nityo 'pi kramavartinaṃ sahakārikāraṇam artham udīkṣamāṇas tāvad asīt, paścāt tam āsādya krameṇa kāryaṃ kuryād iti
GSP29snyayvpu:815: cen, na, sahakārikāraṇasya nitye 'kiñcitkaratvād, akiñcitkarasyāpi pratīkṣaṇe 'navasthāprasaṅgāt. nāpi yaugapadyena nityo 'rtho 'rthakriyāṃ
GSP29snyayvpu:816: kurute, 'dhyakṣavirodhāt. na hy ekakālaṃ sakalāḥ kriyāḥ prārabhamāṇaḥ
GSP29snyayvpu:817: kaścid upalabhate; karotu vā, tathāpy ādyakṣaṇa eva
GSP29snyayvpu:820: [NAV_23.7] nityavādī punar evaṃ pramāṇayati: sarvaṃ nityaṃ sattvāt.
GSP29snyayvpu:821: kṣaṇike sadasatkālayor arthakriyāvirodhāt, tallakṣaṇaṃ sattvaṃ nāvasthāṃ
GSP29snyayvpu:822: badhnātīti, tato nivartamānam ananyaśaraṇatayā nityatvaṃ sādhayati. tathā
GSP29snyayvpu:823: hi: kṣaṇiko 'rthaḥ sad vā kāryaṃ kuryāt, asad vā, gatyantarābhāvāt. na tāvad ādyaḥ pakṣaḥ, samasamayavartini vyāpārāyogāt, sakalabhāvānāṃ parasparaṃ kāryakāraṇabhāvaprāptyātiprasaṅgāc ca. nāpi dvitīyaḥ pakṣaḥ
GSP29snyayvpu:824: kṣodaṃ kṣamate, asataḥ kāryakaraṇaśaktivikalatvāt. anyathā śaśaviṣāṇādayo 'pi kāryakaraṇāyotsaheran, viśeṣābhāvād iti.
GSP29snyayvpu:825: [NAV_23.8] tad evam ekāntadvaye 'pi ye ye hetavas te te yukteḥ samānatayā viruddhaṃ na vyabhicaranty; avicāritaramaṇīyatayā mugdhajanadhyāndhyaṃ cotpādayantīti virudhāvyabhicāriṇo 'naikāntikāḥ, sarvavastudharmāṇāṃ vastuto 'nekāntapratibaddhatvād iti. tasmād amī sarva eva hetavaḥ santo
GSP29snyayvpu:826: 'nekāntam antareṇa nopapadyanta iti tam eva pratipādayitum īśate;
GSP29snyayvpu:827: vimūḍhabuddhibhiḥ punaḥ vipakṣasādhanārtham upanyasyamānā vivakṣayāsiddhaviruddhānaikāntikatām ābibhratīti sthitam.
GSP29snyayvpu:828: [NAV_24.0] tad evaṃ hetvābhāsān pratipādya dṛṣtāntalakṣaṇavyudastān dṛṣṭāntābhāsān āha:
GSP29snyayvpu:831: [NAV_24.1] sādhanaṃ sādhyākrāntam upadarśayitum abhipretaṃ yasmiṃs tat
GSP29snyayvpu:832: sādharmyaṃ, tena. atra vyatikare; dūṣyanta iti doṣāḥ. dṛṣṭāntā eva doṣā
GSP29snyayvpu:833: dṛṣṭāntadoṣāḥ dṛṣṭāntābhāsā ity arthaḥ. nyāyavidīritā vidvadbhir gaditāḥ;
GSP29snyayvpu:834: sādhyaṃ gamyam; ādiśabdāt sādhanobhayaparigrahas; tadvikalās tacchūnyāḥ.
GSP29snyayvpu:835: ādiśabdāt sandigdhasādhyasādhanobhayadharmā gṛhyante. kiṃbhūtā ete ity
GSP29snyayvpu:836: āha: apagataṃ lakṣaṇaṃ yebhyas te tathā, te ca te hetavaḥ, tebhya utthā utthānaṃ yeṣāṃ te 'palakṣaṇahetūtthāḥ; idaṃ ca prāyikaṃ viśeṣaṇaṃ,
GSP29snyayvpu:839: [NAV_24.2] tatra sādhyavikalo yathā: bhrāntam anumānaṃ, pramāṇatvāt,
GSP29snyayvpu:841: sakalavyavahārocchedaprasaṅgāt, taducchede ca pramāṇaprameyābhāvān na kiñcit kenacit sādhyata iti bhrāntavādino mūkatāpanipadyeta. sādhanavikalo
GSP29snyayvpu:844: nāsti sarvajñaḥ, pratyakṣādyanupalabdhatvāt, ghaṭavad; ghaṭasya sattvāt pratyakṣādibhir upalabdhatvāc ca. sandigdhasādhyadharmo yathā: vītarāgo
GSP29snyayvpu:845: 'yaṃ, maraṇadharmatvād, rathyāpuruṣavad; rathyāpuruṣe vītarāgatvasya sandigdhatvād, viśiṣṭacetodharmāṇāṃ viśiṣṭavyāhārādiliṅgagamyatvād rathyāpuruṣe tannirṇayasyāpy abhāvād iti. sandigdhasādhanadharmo yathā:
GSP29snyayvpu:846: maraṇadharmāyaṃ puruṣo, rāgādimattvād, rathyāpuruṣavad; rathyāpuruṣe rāgādimattvasya sandigdhatvād, vītarāgasyāpi tathā sambhavād iti. sandigdhobhayadharmo yathāsarvajño 'yaṃ, rāgādimattvād, rathyāpuruṣavad; rathyāpuruṣe pradarśitanyāyenobhayasyāpi sandigdhatvād iti.
GSP29snyayvpu:847: [NAV_24.3] nanu ca parair anyad api dṛṣṭāntābhāsatrayam uktam, tad yathānanvayo 'pradarśitānvayo viparītānvayaś ceti. tatrānanvayo yathā:
GSP29snyayvpu:848: rāgādimān vivakṣitaḥ puruṣo, vaktṛtvād, iṣṭapuruṣavad iti. yady api kileṣṭapuruṣe rāgādimattvaṃ vaktṛtvaṃ ca sādhyasādhanadharmau dṛṣṭau,
GSP29snyayvpu:849: tathāpi yo yo vaktā sa sa rāgādimān iti vyāptyasiddher ananvayo 'yaṃ
GSP29snyayvpu:850: dṛṣṭāntaḥ. tathāpradarśitānvayo yathānityaḥ śabdaḥ, kṛtakatvād, ghaṭavad
GSP29snyayvpu:851: iti. atra yady api vāstavo 'nvayo 'sti, tathāpi vādinā vacanena na prakāśita ity apradarśitānvayo dṛṣṭāntaḥ. viparitānvayo yathānityaḥ śabdaḥ, kṛtakatvād iti hetum abhidhāya yad anityaṃ tad kṛtakaṃ ghaṭavad
GSP29snyayvpu:852: iti, viparītavyāptidarśanād viparītānvayaḥ, sādharmyaprayoge hi sādhanaṃ
GSP29snyayvpu:853: sādhyākrāntam upadarśanīyam, iha tu viparyāsadarśanād viparītatā. tad etad bhavadbhiḥ kasmān noktam iti.
GSP29snyayvpu:854: [NAV_24.4] atrocyate -- pareṣāṃ na suparyālocitam etad dṛṣṭāntābhāsatrayābhidhānam iti jñāpanārtham. tathā hi: na tāvad ananvayo
GSP29snyayvpu:855: dṛṣṭāntābhāso bhavitum arhati. yadi hi dṛṣṭāntabalena vyāptiḥ sādhyasādhanayoḥ pratipādyeta, tataḥ syād anavayo dṛṣṭāntābhāsaḥ,
GSP29snyayvpu:856: svakāryākaraṇād, yadā tu pūrvapravṛttasambandhagrāhipramāṇagocarasmaraṇasampādanārthaṃ dṛṣṭāntodāhṛtir iti sthitaṃ, tadānanvayatvalakṣaṇo na dṛṣṭāntasya doṣaḥ,
GSP29snyayvpu:857: kiṃ tarhi hetor eva, pratibandhasyādyāpi pramāṇenāpratiṣṭhitatvāt,
GSP29snyayvpu:858: pratibandhābhāve cānvayāsiddheḥ. na ca hetudoṣo 'pi dṛṣṭānte vācyo,
GSP29snyayvpu:861: viparyastānvayapradarśanasya ca vaktṛdoṣatvāt, taddoṣadvareṇāpi dṛṣṭāntābhāsapratipādane tadiyattā viśīryeta, vaktṛdoṣāṇāmānantyāt.
GSP29snyayvpu:862: vaktṛdoṣatve 'pi parārthānumāne tatkauśalam apekṣata iti. evaṃ copanyāse na bubhutsitārthasādhakāv ato dṛṣṭāntābhāsāv etāv iti ced, evaṃ tarhi karaṇāpāṭavādayo 'pi dṛṣṭāntābhāsā vācyāḥ. tathā hi:
GSP29snyayvpu:863: karaṇapāṭavavyatirekeṇāpi na parapratyāyanaṃ samasti, vispaṣṭavarṇāgrahaṇe vyaktatayā tadarthāvagamābhāvād ity āstāṃ tāvat.
GSP29snyayvpu:864: [NAV_25.0] tad evaṃ sādharmyeṇa dṛṣṭāntābhāsān pratipādya vaidharmyeṇāha:
GSP29snyayvpu:867: [NAV_25.1] sādhyābhāvaḥ sādhanābhāvavyāptau darśayitum abhipreto yasmiṃs tad vaidharmyam, tenātra dṛṣṭāntadoṣā nyāyavidīritā iti dattārtham.
GSP29snyayvpu:869: caśabdasya vyavahitaprayogatvāt saṃśayāc ca nivṛttisandehāc cety arthaḥ.
GSP29snyayvpu:870: tad anena ṣaḍ dṛṣṭāntābhāsāḥ sūcitās, tad yathā -- sādhyāvyatirekī,
GSP29snyayvpu:873: [NAV_25.2] tatra sādhyāvyatirekī yathā: bhrāntam anumānam, pramāṇatvād
GSP29snyayvpu:874: iti. atra vaidharmyadṛṣṭānto: yat punar bhrāntaṃ na bhavati na tat
GSP29snyayvpu:875: pramāṇaṃ, tad yathā svapnajñānam iti; svapnajñānād bhrāntatānivṛtteḥ sādhyāvyatirekitvam iti. sādhanāvyatirekī yathā: nirvikalpakaṃ pratyakṣaṃ,
GSP29snyayvpu:876: pramāṇatvād iti. atra vaidharmyadṛṣṭānto: yat punaḥ savikalpakaṃ na tat pramāṇaṃ, tad yathānumānam; anumānāt pramāṇatānivṛtteḥ sādhanāvyatirekitvam iti. ubhayāvyatirekī yathā: nityānityaḥ śabdaḥ,
GSP29snyayvpu:877: sattvād iti. atra vaidharmyadṛṣṭānto: yaḥ punar na nityānityaḥ sa na san,
GSP29snyayvpu:878: tad yathā -- ghaṭo; ghaṭād ubhayasyāpy avyāvṛtter ubhayāvyatirekitvam iti.
GSP29snyayvpu:879: tathā sandigdhasādhyavyatireko yathāsarvajñā anāptā vā kapilādayo,āryasatyacatuṣṭayāpratipādakatvād iti. atra vaidharmyadṛṣṭānto:
GSP29snyayvpu:880: yaḥ punaḥ sarvajña āpto vā 'sāv āryasatyacatuṣṭayaṃ pratyapīpadat, tad yathā -- śauddhodanir iti. ayaṃ ca sādhyāvyatirekī vāryasatyacatuṣṭayasya duḥkhasamudayamārganirodhalakṣaṇasya pramāṇabādhitatvena
GSP29snyayvpu:881: tadbhāṣakasyāsarvajñatānāptatopapatteḥ. kevalaṃ tannirākārakapramāṇasāmarthyaparyālocanavikalānāṃ sandigdhasādhyavyatirekatayā pratibhātīti tathopanyastaḥ. tathā hi: yady apy āryasatyacatuṣṭayaṃ śauddhodaniḥ pratipāditavāṃs, tathāpi sarvajñatāptate tasya na siddhyataḥ, tābhyāṃ
GSP29snyayvpu:883: asarvajñānāptenāpi parapratāraṇābhiprāyapravṛttanipuṇabuddhiśaṭhapuruṣeṇa tathāvidhapratipādanasya kartuṃ śakyatvāt. tasmāc chauddhodaneḥ sakāśād
GSP29snyayvpu:884: asarvajñatānāptatālakṣaṇasya sādhyasya vyāvṛttiḥ sandigdheti sandigdhasādhyavyatirekitvam iti. sandigdhasādhanavyatireko yathā:
GSP29snyayvpu:885: 'nādeyavākyaḥ kaścid vivakṣitaḥ puruṣo rāgādimattvād iti. atra
GSP29snyayvpu:886: vaidharmyadṛṣṭānto: yaḥ punar ādeyavākyo, na sa rāgādimāṃs, tad yathā --

GSP29snyayvpu:935: tuśabdena viśeṣaṇārthena darśayati vastusiddhyarthaṃ vādapravṛttes, tasya
GSP29snyayvpu:937: doṣaprakāśanasyāsambaddhapralāparūpatvād, itarathā tāvanmātreṇāiva parāpākaraṇasiddheḥ samarthasādhanānveṣaṇaprayatno viśīryeta,

GSP29snyayvpu:945: tatsvarūpapracchādanaṃ karmety arthaḥ, sakalaṃ ca tad avāraṇaṃ ca sakalāvaraṇaṃ, tena mukto rahita, ātmā svarūpaṃ yasya tattathā. ata eva kevalam asahāyam, āvaraṇakṣayopaśamavicitratayāiva bodhasya nānākāratayā

GSP29snyayvpu:947: tad idaṃ sakalāvaraṇamuktātmetihetudvāreṇa tathā kevalaṃ yat prakāśata itisvarūpato nirūpyādhunā kāryadvāreṇa nirūpayann āha: sakalārthātmanāṃ samastavastusvarūpāṇāṃ satatapratibhāsanam anavarataprakāśanaṃ sakalārthātmasatatapratibhāsanam iti, pratibhāsyate 'neneti pratibhāsanam,
GSP29snyayvpu:948: ātmano dharmarūpatayā bhedavadvivakṣitaṃ jñānam iti yāvat. asya ca pāramārthikatvaṃ, nirupacaritaśabdārthopapatteḥ. tathā hy: akṣaśabdo
GSP29snyayvpu:949: jīvaparyāyas, tataś cākṣaṃ prati vartata iti pratyakṣaṃ, yatrātmanaḥ sākṣād vyāpāraḥ. vyāvahārikaṃ punar indriyavyavahitātmavyāpārasampādyatvāt
GSP29snyayvpu:950: paramārthataḥ parokṣam eva: dhūmād agnijñānavat, tirodhānāviśeṣāt.

GSP29snyayvpu:959: anarthitvādinā pramātur apravṛttāv anumeyagocarapratyakṣāsambhavena vyabhicāraś codanīyaḥ, sambhavasya sādhyatayābhipretatvāt. na ca sambhavamātre 'sti vyabhicāraḥ, sarvānumeyānāṃ sambhavatpratyakṣatayā vyāptatvād iti.

GSP29snyayvpu:974: yuktaṃ, yad uta na kvacit samastārthasaṃvedanaṃ astīti -- na bhavatas,

GSP29snyayvpu:997: tadgocaratayābhyupagamyate; parasparāvibhaktānekasvabhāvākrāntamūrtikaṃ ca bahir antaś ca vastu sarvapramāṇeṣu prathata ity; atas tad eva teṣāṃ

GSP29snyayvpu:1002: 'nekopakārakatvābhāvāt. na hi yena svabhāvenāikasyopakaroti tenāiva dvitīyasya, tasya tatrāivopayuktatvād,
