GSP29snyayvpu:1006: samavāyād ityuttare 'sāv apy upakāryopakārakabhāvam antareṇa kathaṃ na sarvatreti prācīnaṃ codyaṃ paścāllagnam anudhāvati.
GSP29snyayvpu:1007: upakāryopakārakabhāvābhyupagame punar apy anekasvabhāvatāpradarśitayukteḥ punaḥ śaktyupakārakabhinnaśaktiparikalpane tad evāvartate, tan na bhinnadharmaparikalpane 'py anekāntān mokṣa iti varam ādāv eva matsaritāṃ vihāyānekadharmādhyāsitaṃ vastv abhyupagatam. kiṃ bhedakalpanayāsthāna evātmanā parikleśiteneti. kiṃ cānekāntābhyupagame saty eṣa guṇaḥ:
GSP29snyayvpu:1008: parasparavibhakteṣu saṃyogisaṃyogasamavāyisamavāyaguṇaguṇyavayavāvayavivyaktisāmānyādiṣu saṃyogasamavāyaguṇyavayavisāmānyādīnāṃ saṃyogisamavāyiguṇāvayavaviśeṣādiṣu vartanacintāyāṃ yad dūṣaṇajālam upanipatati, tad api parihṛtaṃ bhavaty,
GSP29snyayvpu:1009: ekāntabheda eva tadupapatter, anekānte tadutthānābhāvāt. tathā hi: bhinnāḥ khalu saṃyogādayaḥ saṃyogyādibhyo vikalpayituṃ pāryante -- yad uta katham
GSP29snyayvpu:1010: eta eteṣu vartanta iti? kim ekadeśena yad vā sāmastyena? yady ekadeśena,
GSP29snyayvpu:1011: tad ayuktaṃ, teṣāṃ niravayavatvābhyupagamāt. sāvayavatve 'pi tebhyo
GSP29snyayvpu:1013: ekasyānekāvayavatvaprāpteḥ. atha bhinnās teṣv api te kathaṃ vartanta ity vācyam: ekadeśena sāmastyena vā. ekadeśapakṣe tad evāvartata ity
GSP29snyayvpu:1014: anavasthā. atha sāmastyena, tad apy asādhīyaḥ, pratyekaṃ parisamāptatayā saṃyogādibahutvaprasaṅgāt. tadabhinnāḥ punaḥ saṃyogādayo na vikalpabhājo bhavanti. abhedapakṣe 'pi saṃyogādimātraṃ saṃyogyādimātraṃ vā syād iti cen, na, tasyāpy ekāntenānabhyupagamāt, kiṃ tarhy anyonyāviśliṣṭasvarūpā
GSP29snyayvpu:1017: abādhitapratibhāseṣu sarvatra teṣāṃ tathāiva pratibhāsanād, anyathā pratibhāsamānānām anyathā
GSP29snyayvpu:1018: dṛṣṭahānyadṛṣṭaparikalpanādvāreṇāsamañjasaprāptes; tathā ca brahmādvaitaśūnyavādādayaḥ siddhim aśnuvīran, viśeṣābhāvād iti.
GSP29snyayvpu:1019: [NAV_29.3] etenāsya hetoḥ kāpilā apy asiddhatādidoṣam abhidhitsavo maukyam
GSP29snyayvpu:1020: ānītāḥ. tathā hy: antar ekaṃ saṃvedanam
GSP29snyayvpu:1021: aparāparaharṣaviṣādādyanantadharmavivartākrāntarūpaṃ bahiś ca ghaṭādikam arthaṃ navapurāṇādivartulapārthivatvādyanekasvabhāvāvaṣṭabdhaśarīraṃ sākṣāl lakṣayantaḥ kathaṃ tadviparītakathane pravarteran?
GSP29snyayvpu:1022: prakṛtipuruṣātmakaṃ dravyam evāikaṃ tāttvikaṃ, paryāyabhrāntijanakaḥ punar vivarto 'pāramārthika iti cen, na, dvayor api sarvapramāṇeṣu
GSP29snyayvpu:1023: prakāśamānayor abādhitayoḥ sarvavyavahāranibandhanayoḥ pakṣapātam antareṇāikasya nihnotum aśakyatvāt. tathā sati vivarta eva tāttviko,
GSP29snyayvpu:1024: dravyaṃ punar alīkam iti paryāyapakṣapātī prasañjayan durniṣedhaḥ syād iti. athettham abhidadhīthā: dravyaṃ sarvatrāvyabhicaritarūpatvāt satyaṃ,
GSP29snyayvpu:1025: paryāyāḥ punar vyabhicāriṇa ity asatyāḥ, tad ayuktam. yadi nāma dravyam
GSP29snyayvpu:1027: vyavacchidyante, tathāpi tat satyam, itare 'līkā iti vaktuṃ na pāryate, na hi nīlaṃ pītarūpatāṃ na bibhartītyetāvatā tad asatyam, atiprasaṅgāt,
GSP29snyayvpu:1029: paryāyās, tadavyatiriktatvāt, tatsvarūpavan, na santi vā
GSP29snyayvpu:1030: dravyavyatirekiṇaḥ paryāyā, niḥsvabhāvatvāt, khapuṣpavad iti pramāṇayasi,
GSP29snyayvpu:1031: tathā sati paryāyā eva dravyaṃ, tadavyatiriktatvāt tatsvarūpavan, nāsti vā paryāyavyatiriktaṃ dravyaṃ, niṣparyāyatvād, ākāśakusumavad itītaro 'pi
GSP29snyayvpu:1032: pramāṇayan kena vāryeta. tan na pakṣadvaye 'pi kācid viśeṣopalabdhir iti.
GSP29snyayvpu:1034: tathāivābhyupagantavyaṃ, tathā cānyasyābhāvāt tad eva tadgocara iti
GSP29snyayvpu:1036: [NAV_29.4] tathā sugatamatānusāriṇām api madhye sautrāntikas tāvad asya hetor asiddhatām āvirbhāvayituṃ notsahate, tadabhyupagativyatirekeṇa
GSP29snyayvpu:1037: nijadarśanavyavasthānupapatteḥ. tathā hi: bahis tāvad ekaṃ kāraṇam
GSP29snyayvpu:1038: aparāparasāmagryantaḥpātitayānekakāryakāryāvedyate, yathā rūpaṃ svottarakṣaṇaṃ svāvagāhijñānādikaṃ ca yugapaj janayati. yadi cāikakṣaṇavartinaḥ sāmagrībhedena bhedam anubhavata eva
GSP29snyayvpu:1039: bhinnadeśanānākāryakāritā, tathā sati nityapakṣoditaṃ dūṣaṇaṃ svamastakopanipāti syāt, tasyāpi tathāiva bhinnakālakāryanirvartane 'pi
GSP29snyayvpu:1043: kiṃ cāyam ekaṃ svāvayavavyāpinaṃ kālāntarasaṃcariṣṇum ākāraṃ sākṣāl lakṣayan kṣaṇakṣayiparamāṇulakṣaṇāni svalakṣaṇāny ācakṣīta nānyathā,
GSP29snyayvpu:1044: yathākūtaṃ tadavabhāsasya svapnāntare 'py anupalakṣaṇāl; lakṣitasya cālakṣitavyatirekanirākaraṇatas tādātmyaṃ kathayan svagirānekāntāvabhāsaṃ samarthayate. tathā hy: alakṣitaparamāṇupārimāṇḍalyapratikṣaṇavivartam api svalakṣaṇaṃ sthirasthūrādyātmanā darśayati svarūpam, anyathā suṣuptaṃ jagad āsajyeta, tadaprakāśane pramāṇāntarasyāpy atyantavilakṣaṇasvalakṣaṇāvedakasyāpravṛttiprasaṅgāt. tathāntaḥsaṃvedanam arthasvarūpāpekṣayā bahirmukhāntarmukhasavikalpāvikalpabhrāntābhrāntādipratibhāsam ekam abhyupayataḥ katham anekāntāvabhāso 'siddhaḥ syāt? tathā nānādeśasthitārthasārthasamarpitākāroparaktam ekam ākārabhede 'py anyathā yugapatprakāśamānasitāsitādyarthavyavasthityanupapatteḥ saṃvedanam
GSP29snyayvpu:1045: anumanyamānaḥ kathaṃ bhinnasamayabhāviharṣaviṣādādyanekavivartavaśāt tadbhedam ātyantikam abhidadhīta, abhinnayogakṣematvād. yugapadbhāvināṃ saṃvidantarniviṣṭākārāṇām ekatvaṃ na harṣādīnāṃ, tadviparyayād iti cen,
GSP29snyayvpu:1046: na, tatsāmarthyavyavasthāpyārthābhedaprasaṅgāt, tadekatayā sitapītādiṣu jñānasya bodharūpeṇāivāviśiṣṭatvāt. tad evaṃ bahir antaś cāikānekarūpatve pramāṇataḥ sthiteḥ svalakṣaṇasyānyathā svābhyupetadarśanavyavasthāyogān nārthavādy anekāntaprakāśaṃ pratikṣeptum arhati.
GSP29snyayvpu:1049: ekayogakṣematvāt tadaikyam iti cen, na, yugapadudayapralayavatāṃ sahavedināṃ sakalasantānānām ekatvaprasaṅgāt. saṃvṛtidarśitatvād
GSP29snyayvpu:1051: cen, na, brahmavādimatāpratiṣedhaprasakter, yato 'nādyavidyābalād ekam akramaṃ sacetanaṃ svasaṃvedanasākṣātkṛtam api brahmānekaṃ kramavac cetanācetanaṃ parokṣāparokṣaṃ lakṣyate,
GSP29snyayvpu:1053: durupapādam. astu vāyam anekāntāvabhāso bhrāntas, tathāpi saṃvedanasyādvayatā na lakṣyate, tallakṣaṇe sakalāsumatām adhunāiva
GSP29snyayvpu:1054: muktatāvāpteḥ. lakṣyate ca tat kathañcid, itarathā suṣuptadaśāvat sarvavyavahārocchedaprasaṅgād ity ekasyāpi saṃvedanasya lakṣitālakṣitatvenānekāntapratibhāso duḥśako 'pahnotum iti jñānavādy apy
GSP29snyayvpu:1055: asya hetor asiddhatāvirbhāvanaṃ prati tūṣṇīm āsīta.
GSP29snyayvpu:1056: [NAV_29.6] śūnyavādinaḥ samastābhāvād asiddho 'nekāntaprakāśa iti cen, na,
GSP29snyayvpu:1058: anyathāpramāṇakaṃ sarvaṃ sarvatra vidyata iti parasyāpi vadato na vadanabhaṅgaḥ syāt, tadabhyupagame 'bhyupagamakṣatiḥ. tayoś ca darśitavad
GSP29snyayvpu:1059: anekāntaprakāśa iti nāsiddho hetuḥ. marumarīcikānicayacumbini saṃvedane jalollekhe 'pi tadgocaratvābhyupagamābhāvād anaikāntiko 'yam iti mā śaṅkiṣṭhās, tasya bhrāntatvād, abhrāntaprakāśo hi tadabhyupagatihetuḥ.
GSP29snyayvpu:1060: athāyam apītaretaravinirluṭhitaparamāṇukṣaṇakṣayibodhena bādhyamānatvād bhrānta ity ācakṣīthās, tad ayuktaṃ, yatas tadbodhaḥ kim upalabdhimātram yad vā nirṇayaḥ? yady ādyaḥ kalpas tadānumānaṃ viśīryeta, nirgocaratvāt,
GSP29snyayvpu:1061: prāthamakalpikenāiva nirvikalpakaviviktadarśanena virodhabhīrutayā sarvathā vastugrahaṇābhyupagamāt, pramāṇakalite ca mānāntaravaiyarthyād,
GSP29snyayvpu:1062: anavasthāprāpteḥ. atha dvitīyas, tathā sati sarvaṃ nirvikalpakam apramāṇatām aśnuvīta. na ca nirṇayo 'nekāntaprakāśaṃ bādhate, 'pi tu
GSP29snyayvpu:1063: samarthayate, bahir antaś ca tathāiva tadvijṛmbhaṇāt. atha sarvathā vastugrahaṇe 'pi nirvikalpakaṃ yatrāṃśe pāścātyaṃ vyavahārakārivyavasāyam
GSP29snyayvpu:1064: upajanayati, tatrāiva pramāṇatām āskandati nānyatreti manyethās, tathā sati yadanantaram arthakriyāsamarthārthaprārthanayā puruṣaḥ pravartate sa eva nirṇayaḥ prāmāṇyaṃ svīkuryān, na nirvikalpakaṃ, tajjanakatve 'pi
GSP29snyayvpu:1065: sannikarṣādivad ity āsajyeta. nirvikalpakam anadhigatārthādhigantṛtvāt pramāṇaṃ, na vyavasitis, tadvikalpatvād iti cen, nānumiter api tadvad
GSP29snyayvpu:1068: trirūpaliṅgajatayā viśeṣo 'numiter mānatāsādhaka iti cet, sākṣād anubhavād utpādas tarhi nirṇīter mahāparādha iti bhavato bālatām īkṣāmahe. kiṃ ca,
GSP29snyayvpu:1069: yathā nirvikalpakam alakṣitaṃ sakalavyāvṛttasvalakṣaṇagrahaṇapravaṇam api katicidaṃśaviṣayaṃ vikalpam utthāpayati, tathārtha evendriyālokādisannikṛṣṭatayā katicinnijāṃśaviṣayaṃ sākṣādviśadavikalpaṃ janayed iti kim ajāgalastanakalpanirvikalpakakalpanayā? tāvanto 'ṃśā
GSP29snyayvpu:1070: bahirarthe virudhyanta iti cet, pāṭavāpāṭavādayo darśane 'py ekasmin na virudhyanta iti kiṃ rājñām ājñā? tasmān na kṣaṇakṣayiparamāṇulakṣaṇasvalakṣaṇalakṣakaṃ kvacit kadācid darśanaṃ lakṣayanti bhavanto 'pi, kevalaṃ svadarśanānuraktāntaḥkaraṇatayā na
GSP29snyayvpu:1071: tadasattāṃ pratipadyante. svāṃśavyāpinaṃ kālāntarānuyāyinam ekaṃ bahir antaś cārthaṃ bodhaṃ ca prakāśayan prathamāno nirṇayaḥ, na punar nirmūlakaiḥ kuyuktivikalpair bādhyata iti na bhrāntaḥ. kiṃ cāsya bhrāntatāṃ kathayan sarvapramāṇaprameyavyavasthām unmūlyati. tathā hi: yat sattvabodharūpatvasukhatvādiṣu pramāṇaṃ tad eva kṣaṇakṣayitvasvargaprāpaṇaśaktiyuktatvādiṣv apramāṇam; tathā yad vastu
GSP29snyayvpu:1074: savikalpakaṃ svapnādidarśanaṃ vā bhrāntaṃ tad eva svarūpāpekṣayābhrāntam;
GSP29snyayvpu:1075: tathā yan niśīthinīnāthadvayādikaṃ dvitve 'līkaṃ tad api dhavalatāniyatadeśacāritādāv analīkam iti nirṇayaḥ. yadi tu virodhād
GSP29snyayvpu:1076: bibhyadbhir bhavadbhir ayam apahnūyate, kim aparam aikāntikaṃ pramāṇaṃ prameyaṃ corarīkṛtya svākūtaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayeyur iti sakautukaṃ naś cetaḥ.
GSP29snyayvpu:1077: [NAV_29.7] atha jñānavādy advaitaprakāśam alakṣitam abhyupetya tena
GSP29snyayvpu:1078: bāhuvidhyaṃ dadhāno bodho bādhyamānatvād bhrānta ity abhidadhyāt, tad
GSP29snyayvpu:1079: ayuktam, dṛṣṭahānyadṛṣṭaparikalpanāprasaṅgād, alakṣitanirvikalpadarśanasya ca prāg eva pratikṣiptatvāt. atha yuktir bodhasya vaividhyaṃ bādheta,
GSP29snyayvpu:1081: saṃvinmātrasya tu sarvatrāvyabhicāritvād, advayaṃ saṃvedanaṃ viviktayuktyā
GSP29snyayvpu:1082: prakāśamānam anādikālālīnavāsanāsamupajanitasaṃvṛtidarśitasattākaṃ sitāsitādivividhapratibhāsaṃ nirākurute. atra pratividadhmahe: kim ayam anekākāro bodho 'dvayasaṃvedanād vyatyaraikṣīd vā na vā. kiṃ cāto, yadi
GSP29snyayvpu:1083: vyabhaitsīt, katham adṛṣṭatatkāryatve vyatirikto 'yaṃ tad advayaṃ saṃvedanam anumāpayet? avyatirekapakṣe punar anekaḥ sann ekasaṃvedanatādātmyena prathamānaḥ katham advaitaṃ noddalayet? atha saṃvṛtidarśitatvād alīkatayāsya sitāsitādyākārabahirmukhakāluṣyasya bodhena tāttvikena saha bhedābhedavikalpānupapattir iti brūṣe, tathā sati paro bodhasyāpāramārthikatvaṃ avidyādarśitatvād, arthasattāyāḥ punas tattvarūpatā, sarvatrāvyabhicārād iti bruvāṇo durnivāraḥ syāt. jaḍasya prakāśāyogāt saṃvittiḥ satyā, nārtha iti ced, ekasyānekatāvabhāsābhāvād anekāntaḥ satyo, nādvaitam iti pratijānīmahe. saṃvṛtyādvayasyāpi nānāpratibhāso 'viruddha iti ced, anādyavidyābalāj jaḍasyāpi cetanatayā
GSP29snyayvpu:1084: prakāśo na viruddha iti parasyāpi śaṭhottaraṃ nātidurlabhaṃ bhavet. kiṃ
GSP29snyayvpu:1085: ca, nānākārakaluṣitacaitanyasāmānyasyānyathānupapattisāmarthyatas tasya siddhatvād advayaṃ saṃvedanam asiddhaṃ sādhayed ayam, anyathā nirnibandhanatayā sādhanasyāpravṛttes, tathā ca sthirasthūrādyupalakṣitārthāṃśavaśād viśakalitaparamāṇukṣaṇakṣayiparyāyatādātmyaṃ sādhayan tam anekāntavādinaṃ na pratikṣeptum arhati, yukter ubhayatrāpi tulyatvāt. kiṃ ca, yo 'yaṃ
GSP29snyayvpu:1087: bhavadabhiprāyo; yathā cānavasthābhīrutayā sarvaṃ jñānaṃ svaprakāśam abhyupetaṃ, tathā sarvo niścayaḥ svaniścāyako 'bhyupagantavyo, 'nyathā
GSP29snyayvpu:1088: tatrāpy anavasthādoṣo 'nuṣajyeta, niścayāś ca sarvathā svarūpaṃ
GSP29snyayvpu:1089: niścinuyur, nāikadeśena, yato "niścayair yan na niścīyate rūpaṃ tat teṣāṃ
GSP29snyayvpu:1090: viṣayaḥ katham" iti svayam eva svavadhāya pralapitam. tathā cādvayasya kṣaṇakṣayiṇaḥ svarūpasya tair grahaṇe viparītāropābhāvād ādita eva anutthānaṃ saṃsārasyeti yuktirikta evāmuktatābhimānaḥ syāt, na cāivam,
GSP29snyayvpu:1093: [NAV_29.8] yadā tu śūnyavādī ‘nirālambanāḥ sarve pratyayāḥ, pratyayatvāt,
GSP29snyayvpu:1095: kathayet, tadā taṃ prati ‘sālambanāḥ sarve pratyayāḥ, pratyayatvāj,
GSP29snyayvpu:1096: jāgraddaśāpratyayavad'; iti viparītānumānam upaḍhaukanīyam. sa yadi dṛṣṭāntasya sādhyavikalatām udbhāvayet, tadā taddṛṣṭānte 'pi sā darśanīyā.
GSP29snyayvpu:1097: yadi punar asau svapnapratyayasya nirālambanatvaṃ bhavadbhir abhipretam iti vilapann āsituṃ na dadyāt, tadā sa vikalpataḥ paryanuyojyo:
GSP29snyayvpu:1098: 'smadabhyupagamaḥ pramāṇaṃ bhavato 'pramāṇaṃ vā? pramāṇaṃ ced, yathā tadbalād dṛṣṭāntasamarthanaṃ tathā jāgratpratyayagocarārthasamarthanam api
GSP29snyayvpu:1099: kiṃ na kuruṣe, ko 'yam ardhajaratīyanyāyaḥ? athāpramāṇam, evaṃ sati svapnapratyayanirālambanatāsādhakaṃ pramāṇāntaraṃ mṛgaṇīyaṃ, kim anena kuśakāśāvalambanena. tatrāpi pramāṇāntare vikalpayugalam amalam avatarati:
GSP29snyayvpu:1100: tat kiṃ nirālambanaṃ sālambanaṃ vā? nirālambanaṃ cen, nānyapratyayasya nirālambanatāṃ gadituṃ paṭiṣṭhaṃ, nirgocaratvāt. atha sālambanaṃ, hanta hato 'si, nirālambanāḥ sarve pratyayā iti pratijñātakṣater, anenāiva vyabhicārād iti śaṭhaḥ pratiśaṭhācaraṇena nirloṭhanīyaḥ. tan
GSP29snyayvpu:1103: 'rthe sarvavādināṃ tathābhyupagamāvigānād iti. anena saṃśayavirodhānavasthāvaiyadhikaraṇyāsambhavādidūṣaṇāni nirmūlakamithyāvikalpotthāpitāni pratibhāsamudgaranipātanirdalitamastakatvān na jīvitum utsahanta iti.
GSP29snyayvpu:1104: tasmād asiddhatādidoṣavinākṛto 'yaṃ tathāpratibhāsalakṣaṇo hetur anekāntagocaratāṃ pramāṇasya parān abhyupagamayatīty alam vistareṇa.
GSP29snyayvpu:1105: tasmāt ‘tasyāiva tatra pratibhāsanāt'; sarvasaṃvidām anekāntātmakaṃ vastu
GSP29snyayvpu:1107: [NAV_29.10] ayaṃ ca yathāvasthitapramāṇavyāpāraparyālocakapramātrabhiprāyeṇa pramāṇagocaro darśitaḥ. nayas tarhi kiṃbhūtam taṃ manyata iti vacanāvakāśe saty āha:
GSP29snyayvpu:1108: eketyādi. anantadharmādhyāsitaṃ vastu svābhipretāikadharmaviśiṣṭaṃ nayati prāpayati saṃvedanam ārohayatīti nayaḥ, pramāṇapravṛtter uttarakālabhāvī parāmarśa ity arthas; tasya viṣayo gocaro mato 'bhipreta
GSP29snyayvpu:1110: prameyarūpaṃ, pramāṇam evaṃvidham evārthaṃ gṛhṇātīti svākutena tena
GSP29snyayvpu:1113: caturvidhāṃ vipratipattiṃ nirākṛtyātrāiva nayagocaraṃ nirūpayann āha:
GSP29snyayvpu:1114: eketyādi. nanu cādivākyena pramāṇavyutpādanamātraṃ pratijñānaṃ, tat kiṃ ayam aprastuto 'tra nayagocaraḥ pratipādyata iti. satyaṃ, evaṃ manyate: na nayaḥ pramāṇād atyantaṃ dūrayāyī, kiṃ tarhi tadaṃśabhūta eva,
GSP29snyayvpu:1116: ‘tanmadhyapatitas tadgrahaṇena gṛhyata'; itinyāyād gṛhīta eva, tan nāyam aprastuta iti.
GSP29snyayvpu:1117: [NAV_29.12] atrāpi padārthaḥ sa eva, kevalaṃ vākyārthabhedaḥ. tathā hīhāivaṃ ghaṭanā: nayasya viṣaya ekadeśaviśiṣṭo 'rtho mato nītividām iti.
GSP29snyayvpu:1118: nanu ca yadi nayasya pramāṇāntaḥpātitve 'pi pṛthag gocaraḥ pratipādyate,
GSP29snyayvpu:1119: tataḥ pramāṇavad etadviṣayā lakṣaṇādivipratipattir api nirākartavyā.
GSP29snyayvpu:1120: satyaṃ, kiṃ tu na pareṣāṃ nayavyavahāraḥ prasiddho, 'to dharmiṇo 'bhāvāt
GSP29snyayvpu:1121: tadgocarā vipratipattir nāsty eva. na ca te tena tattvaṃ pratipādanīyās,
GSP29snyayvpu:1122: tattvapratipādane pramāṇasyāiva vyāpārān, nayasya punar ekadeśaniṣṭhatvena
GSP29snyayvpu:1124: tallakṣaṇādisvarūpakathane 'pi mahānādaraḥ. gocaraṃ punar heyapakṣe kākvā prakṣipan sākṣāt pratipādayati: mā bhūt svadarśanāntaḥpātināṃ
GSP29snyayvpu:1125: mandabuddhīnāṃ pramāṇapratipanne 'py anekāntātmake vastuny ekadeśasamarthanābhiniveśalakṣaṇaḥ kadāgraha iti. athavā svadarśanāntaḥpātinaḥ praty anenāiva gocarakathanenopalakṣaṇatvāl lakṣaṇādīny api lakṣayati. tatra pramāṇapratipannārthāikadeśaparāmarśo naya iti lakṣaṇaṃ, sarvanayaviśeṣānuyāyitvāt pararūpavyāvartanakṣamatvāc cāsya. saṃkhyayā punar anantā iti, anantadharmatvād vastunas,
GSP29snyayvpu:1126: tadekadharmaparyavasitābhiprāyāṇāṃ ca nayatvāt, tathāpi cirantanācāryaiḥ sarvasaṅgrāhisaptābhiprāyaparikalpanādvāreṇa sapta nayāḥ pratipāditāḥ. tad yathā -- ‘naigamasaṅgrahavyavahārarjusūtraśabdasamabhirūḍhāivambhūtā
GSP29snyayvpu:1127: nayā'; iti. ato 'smābhir api ta eva varṇyante.
GSP29snyayvpu:1128: [NAV_29.13] katham ete sarvābhiprāyasaṅgrāhakā iti ced, ucyate: 'bhiprāyas
GSP29snyayvpu:1129: tāvad arthadvāreṇa śabdadvāreṇa vā pravarteta, gatyantarābhāvād; arthaś ca sāmānyarūpo viśeṣarūpo vā, śabdo 'pi rūḍhito vyutpattitaś ca, vyutpattir api sāmānyanimittaprayuktā tatkālabhāvinimittaprayuktā vā syāt. tatra ye kecanārthanirūpaṇapravaṇāḥ pramātrabhiprāyās te sarve 'py ādye nayacatuṣṭaye 'ntarbhavanti. tatrāpi ye parasparaviśakalitau
GSP29snyayvpu:1130: sāmānyaviśeṣāv icchanti tatsamudāyarūpo naigamaḥ. ye punaḥ kevalaṃ
GSP29snyayvpu:1131: sāmānyaṃ vāñchanti tatsamūhasampādyaḥ saṅgrahaḥ. ye punar anapekṣitaśāstrīyasāmānyaviśeṣaṃ lokavyavahāram avatarantaṃ ghaṭādikaṃ padārtham abhiprayanti tannicayajanyo vyavahāraḥ. ye tu kṣaṇakṣayiṇaḥ
GSP29snyayvpu:1132: paramāṇulakṣaṇā viśeṣāḥ satyā iti manyante tatsaṅghātaghaṭita ṛjusūtra
GSP29snyayvpu:1133: iti. tathā ye rūḍhitaḥ śabdānāṃ pravṛttiṃ vāñchanti tannivahasādhyaḥ śabda iti. ye tu vyutpattito dhvanīnāṃ pravṛttiṃ vāñchanti nānyathā tadvārajanyaḥ samabhirūḍha iti. ye tu vartamānakālabhāvivyutpattinimittam
GSP29snyayvpu:1134: adhikṛtya śabdāḥ pravartante nānyatheti manyante tatsaṅghaghaṭitaḥ khalv evambhūta iti. tad evaṃ na kaścid vikalpo 'sti vastugocaro yo 'tra
GSP29snyayvpu:1135: nayasaptake nāntaryātīti sarvābhiprāyasaṅgrāhakā ete iti sthitam.
GSP29snyayvpu:1136: [NAV_29.14] sāmpratam eṣām eva pratyekaṃ matam upavarṇayāmaḥ. tatra gamanaṃ gamaḥ pariccheda ity arthaḥ. niścito gamo nigamo
GSP29snyayvpu:1137: viviktavastugrahaṇaṃ, sa eva, prajñāder ākṛtigaṇatayā svārthikāṇpratyayavidhānān naigamaḥ. yadi vā nigamyante niyataṃ paricchidyanta iti nigamā arthās teṣu bhavo yo 'bhiprāyo
GSP29snyayvpu:1138: niyataparicchedarūpaḥ sa naigama iti. ayaṃ hi sattālakṣaṇaṃ mahāsāmānyam avāntarasāmānyāni ca dravyatvaguṇatvakarmatvādīni tathāntyān viśeṣān
GSP29snyayvpu:1139: sakalāsādhāraṇarūpalakṣaṇān avāntaraviśeṣāṃś cāpekṣayā pararūpavyāvartanakṣamān sāmānyād atyantavinirluṭhitasvarūpān
GSP29snyayvpu:1140: tathā hi: kila saṃvinniṣṭhāḥ padārthavyavasthitayo, na ca sāmānyagrāhiṇi
GSP29snyayvpu:1142: anyathā sāmānyagrāhakatvāyogāt. nāpi viśeṣagrahaṇadakṣe saṃvedane sāmānyaṃ
GSP29snyayvpu:1144: viśeṣasaṃvedanatvāyogāt. na cāitau parasparavibhinnāv api pratibhāsamānau sāmānyaviśeṣau kathañcin miśrayitum yuktāv, atiprasaṅgād,
GSP29snyayvpu:1145: vibhinnapratibhāsinām api nikhilārthātmanām aikyaprāpteḥ. evaṃ ca pramāṇayati: parasparaviśliṣṭau sāmānyaviśeṣau, pārthakyenopalabdher, iha yad yat pārthakyenopalabhyate tat tat parasparaviśliṣṭaṃ dravyaṃ, tad yathā -- devadattayajñadattāv iti, pārthakyena copalabhyete sāmānyaviśeṣāv, ataḥ parasparavibhinnāv iti. na sāmānyāt pṛthag
GSP29snyayvpu:1146: viśeṣopalambha iti cet, kathaṃ tarhi tasyopalambha iti vācyam.
GSP29snyayvpu:1147: sāmānyavyāptasyeti cen, na tarhi sa viśeṣopalambhaḥ, sāmānyasyāpi tena grahaṇāt; tataś ca tena bodhena viviktaviśeṣagrahaṇābhāvāt tadvācakaṃ
GSP29snyayvpu:1148: dhvaniṃ tatsādhyaṃ ca vyavahāraṃ na pravartayet pramātā; na cāitad asti,
GSP29snyayvpu:1150: tatra ca vyavahāraṃ pravartayatā tadgrāhako bodho vivikto
GSP29snyayvpu:1151: 'bhyupagantavyaḥ. tathā sāmānyam api viviktākāratayā svagrāhiṇi jñāne yadi na prakāśeta, tadā tadgocarābhimatasaṃvedanena viśeṣasyāpy ākalanāt sāmānyābhidhānavyavahārayoḥ pravṛtter ucchedas tathāiva vaktavyo,
GSP29snyayvpu:1153: abhāvāpatteḥ. na ca sāmānyaṃ viśeṣaṃ vā tiraskṛtya kevalasya viśeṣasya sāmānyasya vābhyupagamaḥ kartuṃ yukto, dvayor api svagrāhijñāne
GSP29snyayvpu:1154: pratibhāsamānatayā viśeṣābhāvāt. tasmād etau dvāv apītaretaraviśakalitāv aṅgīkaraṇārhāv iti
GSP29snyayvpu:1155: [NAV_29.15] adhunā saṅgrahābhiprāyo varṇyate. tatra saṅgṛhṇāty aśeṣaviśeṣatirodhānadvāreṇa sāmānyarūpatayā jagad ādatta iti saṅgrahaḥ.
GSP29snyayvpu:1156: ayaṃ hi manyate: bhāvalakṣaṇasāmānyād vyatiricyamānamūrtayo vā viśeṣāḥ
GSP29snyayvpu:1157: parikalpyerann, avyatiricyamānamūrtayo vā, gatyantarābhāvāt. tatra yady ādyaḥ pakṣas, tadā niḥsvabhāvatāṃ te svīkuryur, bhāvavyatirekitvād,
GSP29snyayvpu:1158: gaganakusumādivat. atha dvitīyaḥ kalpas, tarhi bhāvamātram āpadyante.
GSP29snyayvpu:1159: tathā hi: bhāvamātraṃ viśeṣās, tadavyatiriktatvād, iha yad yato
GSP29snyayvpu:1160: 'vyatiriktaṃ tat tad eva bhavati, tad yathā -- bhāvasyāiva svarūpam,
GSP29snyayvpu:1161: avyatirekiṇaś ca viśeṣā, atas tadrūpā eva. nanu ca yadi bhāvamātram eva tattvaṃ tadā tasya sarvatrāviśeṣād ya ete pratiprāṇiprasiddhāḥ stambhebhakumbhāmbhorūhādiviśiṣṭavastusādhyā vyavahārās te sarve 'pi
GSP29snyayvpu:1162: pralayam āpadyerann, ato viśeṣā api viviktavyavahārahetavo
GSP29snyayvpu:1165: viśeṣāgraho viśeṣeṇa tyājyo, viśeṣavyavasthāpakapramāṇābhāvāt. tathā hi:
GSP29snyayvpu:1166: bhedarūpā viśeṣāḥ, na ca kiñcit pramāṇaṃ bhedam avagāhate, pratyakṣaṃ hi tāvad bhāvasampāditasattākaṃ tam eva sākṣatkartuṃ yuktam, nābhāvaṃ, tasya sakalaśaktiviraharūpatayā tadutpādane vyāpārābhāvād, anutpādakasya ca sākṣātkaraṇe sarvasākṣātkaraṇaprasaṅgāt, tathā ca viśeṣābhāvāt sarvo
GSP29snyayvpu:1167: draṣṭāsarvadarśīsyāt. aniṣṭam cāitad bhavatāṃ, tasmād bhāvagrāhakam eva
GSP29snyayvpu:1168: tad eṣṭavyam. sa ca bhāvaḥ sarvatrāviśiṣṭa iti tathāiva tena grāhyas,
GSP29snyayvpu:1169: taduttarakālabhāvī punar vikalpo ghaṭo 'yaṃ paṭādir na bhavatīty evamākāro vyavahāraṃ racayann avidyāmūlatvān na pramāṇaṃ, tan na pratyakṣād
GSP29snyayvpu:1171: tasmāt sāmānyam eva paramārtho, na viśeṣā iti saṅgrahaḥ.
GSP29snyayvpu:1172: [NAV_29.16] sāmprataṃ vyavahāramatam ucyate. tatra vyavaharaṇaṃ vyavahriyate vānena laukikair abhiprāyeṇeti vyavahāraḥ. ayaṃ tu manyate:
GSP29snyayvpu:1173: yathā lokagrāham eva vastv astu, kim
GSP29snyayvpu:1176: netarasya, na hi sāmānyam anādinidhanam ekaṃ saṅgrāhābhimataṃ
GSP29snyayvpu:1178: nāpi viśeṣāḥ paramāṇulakṣaṇāḥ kṣaṇakṣayiṇaḥ pramāṇagocaras, tathā pravṛtter abhāvāt. tasmād idam eva nikhilalokābādhitaṃ pramāṇaprasiddhaṃ kiyatkālabhāvisthūratām ābibhrāṇam udakāharaṇādyarthakriyānirvartanakṣamaṃ
GSP29snyayvpu:1181: pramāṇaprasarābhāvāt, pramāṇam antareṇa ca vicārasya kartum aśakyatvāt.
GSP29snyayvpu:1182: avastutvāc ca teṣāṃ, kiṃ tadgocaraparyālocanena? tathā hi:
GSP29snyayvpu:1183: pūrvottarakālabhāvino dravyavivartāḥ kṣaṇakṣayiparamāṇulakṣaṇā vā viśeṣā na kañcana lokavyavahāram uparacayanti, tan na te vasturūpā,
GSP29snyayvpu:1185: [NAV_29.17] sāmprataṃ ṛjusūtrābhiprāyaḥ kathyate. tatra rju praguṇam
GSP29snyayvpu:1186: akuṭilam atītānagatavakraparityāgād vartamānakṣaṇavivartivastuno rūpaṃ sūtrayati niṣṭaṅkitaṃ darśayatīty ṛjusūtraḥ. tathā hy: asyābhiprāyo --
GSP29snyayvpu:1189: arthakriyākṣamaṃ ca vastu; tadabhāvān na tayor vastutvam iti.
GSP29snyayvpu:1190: vartamānakṣaṇāliṅgitaṃ ca punar vasturūpaṃ samastārthakriyāsu vyāpriyata iti tad eva pāramārthikam. tad api ca niraṃśam abhyupagantavyam,
GSP29snyayvpu:1193: virodhavyāghrāghrātatvāt. tathā hi: yady ekaḥ svabhāvaḥ katham anekaḥ?
GSP29snyayvpu:1194: anekaś cet katham ekaḥ? ekānekayoḥ parasparaparihāreṇāvasthānāt; tasmāt svarūpanimagnāḥ paramāṇava eva parasparopasarpaṇadvāreṇa kathañcin
GSP29snyayvpu:1195: nicayarūpatām āpannā nikhilakāryeṣu vyāpārabhāja iti ta eva svalakṣaṇaṃ,
GSP29snyayvpu:1196: na sthūratāṃ dhārayat pāramārthikaṃ iti. kiṃ ca, pramāṇato 'rthavyavasthā,
GSP29snyayvpu:1197: na ca pramāṇaṃ deśakālavyāptigrahaṇe kiñcana pravartate, sarvapramāṇānāṃ
GSP29snyayvpu:1198: vartamānaprakāśarūpatvāt. tathā hi: pratyakṣaṃ tāvad rūpālokamanaskāracakṣurlakṣaṇakāraṇacatuṣṭayāl labdhasattākaṃ vartamānakṣaṇa eva prakāśate, atītavartsyatkṣaṇayor asannihitatvāt, tataś ca tat tatkālasambaddham eva vastuno rūpaṃ sākṣātkartuṃ kṣamate na pūrvam aparaṃ vāsannidhānād eva. yadi punar vinaṣṭam api
GSP29snyayvpu:1200: kṣaṇaparamparā tatra pratīyeta, tathā ca sati
GSP29snyayvpu:1201: saṅkalikayānādijanmaparamparāgrāhi pratyakṣam anuṣajyeta. evam anāgatakṣaṇagrahaṇe 'pi yojyam; aniṣṭaṃ cāitat, tasmāt tad vārtamānikakṣaṇagrahaṇadakṣam evety abhyupagantavyam. nanu ca yadi
GSP29snyayvpu:1202: kṣaṇabhaṅguratām arthātmanām adhyakṣam avalokayati, tadā nīlateva pratibhāsamānā sā vipratipattigocaraṃ na yāyād iti tadviṣayo laukikānāṃ vyavahāraḥ pravarteta, na cāitad asti, sthiratādvāreṇa vyavahārapravṛtter iti. atra pratividhīyate -- sākṣātkurvāṇā api kṣaṇavinaśvaratāṃ
GSP29snyayvpu:1204: anādikālaprarūḍhavāsanāprabodhasamupajanitamithyāvikalpasāmarthyāc ca viparyastasthiratāvyavahāraṃ pravartayanti, tan nāyam adhyakṣasyāparādho,
GSP29snyayvpu:1207: tatpratibhāsāyogāt, karacaraṇaśirogrīvādayo hy avayavāḥ parasparavibhaktā eva tatra pratibhānti, na vyāpyākāro, na ca te 'pi svāṃśavyāpinaḥ
GSP29snyayvpu:1208: pratibhānti, tadavayavānām apītaretaraviśakalitarūpāṇāṃ pratibhāsāt tāvad yāvat paramāṇava eva prathante, vyāpirūpasya vicārākṣamatvād ity
GSP29snyayvpu:1209: uktaprāyam. nāpy anumānāt sthirasthūravastusiddhiḥ, pratyakṣaparigṛhītaṃ hi sambandham āsādyānumānaṃ pravarteta, yadā ca tat
GSP29snyayvpu:1210: kṣaṇabhaṅguraviviktāṃśagrahaṇacāturyam ābibhrad darśitaṃ tadānumānam api tatpratibandhamūlakaṃ tadgocaram eva pāramparyeṇa pratiṣṭhāpayati,
GSP29snyayvpu:1213: nopapadyante, pūrvam adṛṣṭe tadabhāvāt, puruṣādyavayavināṃ smaraṇāt pratyabhijñānāc ca. nāitad asti, teṣām alīkavāsanāprabodhotthāpitatvena prāmāṇyāyogāt. kiṃ ca, tāny api svayaṃ vartamānakṣaṇa eva prakāśante,
GSP29snyayvpu:1214: viplavavaśāt tu svarūpam eva vāsanāsampāditātītārtharūpatayā vyavasyanti,
GSP29snyayvpu:1215: ghanākāraṃ ca tasyāsantam adhyāropayanti; tan na tebhyo 'pi
GSP29snyayvpu:1216: vyāpivastusiddhiḥ. tasmād vyāpini rūpe pramāṇānavatārāt parasparaviśliṣṭāḥ paramāṇava eva paramārthata iti rjusūtraḥ.
GSP29snyayvpu:1217: [NAV_29.18] tad idam arthasvarūpanirūpaṇanipuṇānāṃ nayānāṃ matam upavarṇitam; adhunā śabdavicāracaturāṇām upavarṇyate. tatra trayāṇām api
GSP29snyayvpu:1218: śabdādīnām idaṃ sādhāraṇamākūtaṃ, yad uta śabda eva paramārtho nārthas,
GSP29snyayvpu:1219: tasya tadavyatiriktatvāt. pārthakyena vastutvasiddheḥ katham avyatireka iti cet, pramāṇād iti brūmaḥ. tathā hi: na vyatirikto 'rthaḥ śabdāt,
GSP29snyayvpu:1220: tatpratītau tasya pratīyamānatvād, iha yatpratītau yat pratīyate tat tato
GSP29snyayvpu:1221: 'vyatiriktaṃ bhavati, tad yathā -- śabde pratīyamāne tasyāiva svarūpaṃ,
GSP29snyayvpu:1222: pratīyate ca śabde pratīyamāne 'rtho, 'to 'sau tato 'vyatirikta iti.
GSP29snyayvpu:1224: iti ced, evaṃ tarhi viṣasya māraṇātmakatvaṃ tadajñasya na pratibhātīti tat tato vyatiriktam āpadyeta, na cāitad asti, tadvyatirekāviśeṣeṇa guḍakhaṇḍavad viṣasyāpy amārakatvāpatteḥ, sambandhasya ca vyatiriktena
GSP29snyayvpu:1225: saha prāg evāpāstatvāt; tan nābuddhapramātṛdoṣeṇa vastuno 'nyathātvam,
GSP29snyayvpu:1226: anyathāndho rūpaṃ nekṣata iti tadabhāvo 'pi pratipattavya iti. ye nirabhidhānā vartante 'rthās teṣāṃ śabdāt pārthakyena vastutvasiddhir iti cen, na, nirabhidhānārthābhāvāt, kevalaṃ kecid viśeṣaśabdaiḥ saṅkīrtyante,
GSP29snyayvpu:1227: kecit sāmānyadhvanibhir ity etāvān viśeṣaḥ syāt. yadi vā sakalārthavācakā
GSP29snyayvpu:1228: viśeṣadhavanayo na santīti nāsty atra pramāṇam. tataś ca sarve 'rthā
GSP29snyayvpu:1229: vidyamānasvavācakā, 'rthatvād, ghaṭārthavad iti pramāṇāt sarveṣāṃ svavācakatvena pūrvoktayukteḥ śabdād apārthakyasiddhiḥ. tasmān na paramārthato 'rthaḥ śabdātirikto 'sty, upacārataḥ punar laukikair
GSP29snyayvpu:1230: aparyālocitaparamārthair vyavahriyate. asāv apy aupacārikaḥ śabdātmako vārthaḥ pratikṣaṇabhaṅguraḥ svīkartavyo, varṇānāṃ kṣaṇadhvaṃsitāpratīter,
GSP29snyayvpu:1232: [NAV_29.19] sāmpratam eteṣām eva pratyekam abhiprāyaḥ kathyate. tatra
GSP29snyayvpu:1233: śabdo: rūḍhito yāvanto dhvanayaḥ kasmiṃścid arthe pravartante;
GSP29snyayvpu:1234: yathendraśakrapurandarādayaḥ, teṣāṃ sarveṣām apy ekam artham abhipraiti
GSP29snyayvpu:1235: kila pratītivaśād, yathā śabdāvyatireko 'rthasya pratipādyate tathāiva tasyāikatvaṃ vānekatvaṃ vā pratipādanīyaṃ; na cendraśakrapurandarādayaḥ paryāyaśabdā vibhinnārthavācitayā kadācana pratīyante, tebhyaḥ
GSP29snyayvpu:1236: sarvadāivāikākāraparāmarśotpatter, askhaladvṛttitayā tathāiva vyavahāradarśanāt. tasmād eka eva paryāyaśabdānām artha iti śabdaḥ,
GSP29snyayvpu:1237: śabdyata āhūyate 'nenābhiprāyeṇārtha iti niruktād ekārthapratipādanābhiprāyeṇāiva paryāyadhvanīnāṃ prayogād iti.
GSP29snyayvpu:1238: [NAV_29.20] sāmprataṃ samabhirūḍhamatam upavarṇyate. tatra sam ekībhāvenābhirohati vyutpattinimittam āskandati śabdapravṛttau yo 'bhiprāyaḥ sa samabhirūḍhaḥ. ayaṃ hi paryāyaśabdānāṃ prativibhaktam evārtham abhimanyate, tad yathendanād indraḥ, paramāiśvaryam indraśabdavācyaṃ paramārthatas, tadvaty arthe punar upacārataḥ pravartate,
GSP29snyayvpu:1239: na vā kaścit tadvān, sarvaśabdānāṃ parasparavibhaktārthapratipādakatayāśrayāśrayibhāvena pravṛttyasiddheḥ.
GSP29snyayvpu:1240: evaṃ śakanāc chakraḥ, pūrdāraṇāt purandara ityādi bhinnārthatvaṃ sarvaśabdānāṃ darśayati; pramāṇayati ca: paryāyaśabdā vibhinnārthāḥ,
GSP29snyayvpu:1243: yathendraghaṭapuruṣaśabdā vibhinnārthā, vibhinnavyutpattinimittakāś ca paryāyaśabdā apy, ato 'bhinnārthā iti. yat punar avicāritapratītibalād
GSP29snyayvpu:1244: ekārthābhidhāyakatvaṃ pratipādyate tad ayuktam, atiprasaṅgāt. tathā hi:
GSP29snyayvpu:1245: yadi yuktiriktā pratītir eva śaraṇīkriyate tadā mandamandaprakāśe davīyasi deśe sanniviṣṭaśarīrā vibhinnā api nimbakadambāśvatthakapitthādaya ekatarvākāratām ābibhrāṇāḥ pratīyanta ity ekatayāivābhyupagantavyāḥ. na cāitad asti, viviktatatsvarūpagrāhipratyanīkapratyayopanipātabādhitatvena pūrvapratīter viviktānām eva teṣām abhyupagamāt, tan nāikārthavācino dhvanayaḥ santi, rūḍhiḥ punar avicāritatadarthānām iti samabhirūḍhaḥ.
GSP29snyayvpu:1247: prakāravacanas, tataś cāivaṃ yathā vyutpāditas taṃ prakāraṃ bhūtaḥ prāpto yaḥ śabdaḥ sa evambhūtaḥ; tatsamarthanapradhāno 'bhiprāyo 'py evambhūtas,
GSP29snyayvpu:1248: tadviṣayatvāt, viṣayaśabdena ca viṣayiṇo 'bhidhānāt. ayaṃ hi yasminn arthe śabdo vyutpādyate sa vyutpattinimittam artho yadāiva vivartate tadāiva taṃ śabdaṃ pravartamānam abhipraiti, na sāmānyena. yathodakādyāharaṇavelāyāṃ yoṣidādimastakārūḍho viśiṣṭaceṣṭāvān eva ghaṭo 'bhidhīyate, na śeṣo,
GSP29snyayvpu:1249: ghaṭaśabdavyutpattinimittaśūnyatvāt, paṭādivad iti. atītāṃ bhāvinīṃ vā
GSP29snyayvpu:1250: ceṣṭām adhikṛtya sāmānyenāivocyata iti cen, na, tayor vinaṣṭānutpannatayā śaśaviṣāṇakalpatvāt; tathāpi taddvāreṇa śabdapravartane sarvatra
GSP29snyayvpu:1251: pravartayitavyo, viśeṣābhāvāt. kiṃ ca, yady atītavartsyacceṣṭāpekṣayā ghaṭaśabdo 'ceṣṭāvaty api prayujyeta, kapālamṛtpiṇḍādāv api tatpravartanaṃ
GSP29snyayvpu:1252: durnivāraṃ syāt, viśeṣābhāvāt, tasmād yatra kṣaṇe vyutpattinimittam avikalam asti tasminn eva so 'rthas tacchabdena vācya ity evambhūtaḥ.
GSP29snyayvpu:1254: taddvārāyātaḥ punar ekadharmaniṣṭhārthasamarthanapravaṇaḥ parāmarśaḥ śeṣadharmasvīkāratiraskāraparihāradvāreṇa vartamāno nayaḥ, sa ca dharmāṇām
GSP29snyayvpu:1255: ānantyād anantabhedas, tathāpi sarvasaṅgrāhakābhiprāyaparikalpanamukhenāivaṃ saptabhedo darśitaḥ. ayam eva ca svābhipretadharmāvadhāraṇātmakatayāśeṣadharmatiraskāradvāreṇa pravartamāṇaḥ parāmarśo durnayasaṃjñām aśnute; tadbalaprabhāvitasattākā hi khalv ete parapravādāḥ. tathā hi: naigamanayadarśanānusāriṇau
GSP29snyayvpu:1256: naiyāyikavaiśeṣikau. saṅgrahābhiprāyapravṛttāḥ sarve 'py advaitavādāḥ sāṃkhyadarśanaṃ ca. vyavahāranayānupāti prāyaś cārvākadarśanam.
GSP29snyayvpu:1257: ṛjusūtrākūtapravṛttabuddhayas tāthāgatāḥ. śabdādinayamatāvalambino vaiyākaraṇādaya iti. athettham abhidadhīthā, yathā: katham ete 'vadhāraṇadvāreṇa svakam arthaṃ samarthayantas tadviparītaṃ nirākurvāṇā durnayatāṃ pratipadyanta ity, atrocyate -- evaṃ pravṛttau nirgocaratvān,
GSP29snyayvpu:1258: nirgocarasya nayatvāyogāt. tathā hi: nayati kenacid aṃśena viśiṣṭam arthaṃ prāpayati yo 'bhiprāyaḥ sa nayaḥ, svābhipretadharmāc cheṣadharmapratikṣepadvāreṇa tu pravṛtto na kiñcin nayaty,
GSP29snyayvpu:1259: ekadharmāliṅgitasya vastuno 'sambhavād, bahir antaś cānekadharmaparikaritasvabhāvasya tasya pratibhāsāt, tadapahnavakāriṇāṃ kadabhiprāyāṇāṃ pratibhāsabādhitatvenālīkatvāt.
GSP29snyayvpu:1260: [NAV_29.23] tathā hi: yaḥ tāvan naigamanayaḥ parasparaviśliṣṭau sāmānyaviśeṣau pratyapīpadat, tad ayuktam. tayos tathā kadācana
GSP29snyayvpu:1261: pratibhāsābhāvāt. yac coktam: anuvartamānāikākāraparāmarśagrāhyaṃ sāmānyaṃ yatra na tatra viśeṣapratibhāso, yatra ca viśiṣṭadeśadaśāvacchinnabodhanirgrāhyo viśeṣo na tatra sāmānyāvagatis,
GSP29snyayvpu:1263: vṛkṣatvādisāmānyapratibhāsābhāvāt. dūrād viśeṣāgrahaṇe 'pi kevalaṃ tac cakāstīti cen, na, tatrāpy abhyantarībhūtaviśeṣapratibhāsāt, tadvirahe
GSP29snyayvpu:1264: śaśaviṣāṇarūpatvāt. evaṃ viśeṣā api na sāmānyād atyantavyatirekiṇaḥ
GSP29snyayvpu:1265: pratibhānti, tannimagnānām eva teṣāṃ grahaṇād, itarathā sattāto 'tiricyamānā bhāvā niḥsvabhāvatām ātmasātkurvanti. tathā vṛkṣatvādisāmānyebhyo 'pi bhedino vṛkṣādayo na syus,
GSP29snyayvpu:1266: tadabhedanibandhanatvāt tatsvarūpasthiteḥ. tasmāt tad eva saṃvedanam upasarjanīkṛtavaiṣamyaṃ pradhānīkṛtāikākāraṃ sāmānyaṃ gṛhṇātīty ucyate,
GSP29snyayvpu:1267: nyakkṛtasamatvam utkalitanānātvaṃ punar viśeṣagrahīti, samatvanānātvayoḥ kathañcid bhedābhedinoḥ parasparaṃ sarvārtheṣu bhāvāt, tadabhāve
GSP29snyayvpu:1268: tathāvidhapratibhāsānupapatteḥ. etena yad avādi "na cāitau vibhinnāv api
GSP29snyayvpu:1269: pratibhāsamānau sāmānyaviśeṣau kathañcin miśrayituṃ yuktāv" ityādi, tad apāstam avagantavyaṃ, vibhinnayoḥ pratibhāsābhāvāt. vyavahāro 'pi sarvaḥ pradhānopasarjanadvāreṇa kathañcid
GSP29snyayvpu:1271: dohavāhādikriyāyām upayujyate, viśeṣāṇām eva tatropayogān, nāpi viśeṣā eva
GSP29snyayvpu:1273: tatkaraṇasāmarthyābhāvāt. kiṃ cātyantavyatireke sāmānyaviśeṣayor vṛkṣaṃ chindhīti coditaḥ kim iti tadviśeṣe palāśādauchedaṃ vidhatte? tatra tasya samavāyād iti cen, na, samavāyagrāhakapramāṇābhāvād, bhāve 'pi viśliṣṭayor
GSP29snyayvpu:1275: nityatvāikatvasarvagatatvādibhiś ca sarvatra tatkaraṇaprasaṅgāc ca. yat punar avādīr, yad uta: yadi sāmānyaṃ viśeṣaniṣṭhaṃ, viśeṣo vā sāmānyavyāptaḥ samupalabhyeta, tato viviktayos tayoḥ kvacid anupalambhād yo 'yaṃ vivikteṣu sāmānyeṣu viśeṣeṣu cābhidhānārthakriyālakṣaṇo vyavahāraḥ sa samastaḥ pralayaṃ yāyāl, lolībhāvena tadvivekasya kartum aśakyatvāt,
GSP29snyayvpu:1276: tad apy asamīcīnaṃ, yato yady api parasparāviviktayoḥ sāmānyaviśeṣayoḥ sarvatropalambhas, tathāpi yatrāiva pramātur arthitvaṃ tad eva sāmānyaṃ,
GSP29snyayvpu:1277: viśeṣān vā pradhānīkṛtya tadgocaraṃ dhvanim arthakriyāṃ vā pravartayatītarasyāpy upasarjanabhāvena tatra vyāpārāt,
GSP29snyayvpu:1278: tadvikalasyetarasyāpi śaśaviśāṇāyamānatayā kvacid anupayogāt. kiṃ cātyantavyatirekiṇi viśeṣebhyaḥ sāmānye vṛttivikalpopalambhanūtanaviśeṣasambandhādidvāreṇa dūṣaṇamudgarakadambakaṃ
GSP29snyayvpu:1279: mūrdhani patad durviṣahaṃ syāt. tathā hi: tat teṣu kathaṃ varteta --
GSP29snyayvpu:1281: sāmānyabahutvaprasaṅgo, 'niṣṭaṃ cāitad, ekatvābhupagamakṣateḥ. ekadeśena vartane punar yāvanto viśeṣās tāvantas tadaṃśāḥ prasajanti, na cāitad asti, sāmānyasya niravayavatvāt; sāvayavatve 'pi punas te 'bhinnā bhinnā
GSP29snyayvpu:1282: vā. yady abhinnā viśeṣās, tarhy abhedinaḥ kiṃ neṣyante, viśeṣābhāvāt.
GSP29snyayvpu:1283: bhedapakṣe punas teṣv api tat kathaṃ varteta -- sāmastyenāikadeśena veti?
GSP29snyayvpu:1284: tad eva codyam alabdhapariniṣṭham avatarati, tan nātyantabhedino vṛttiḥ
GSP29snyayvpu:1285: sambhavati. kiṃ ca, yady ekaṃ sāmānyaṃ bhedavat samastaviśeṣeṣu varteta,
GSP29snyayvpu:1286: tadāikaviśeṣopalambhakāle tad upalambhyate na vā? yady ādyaḥ pakṣas,
GSP29snyayvpu:1290: sannihitaviśeṣaniṣṭham eva tad upalabhyate. tasyāiva tadvyañjakatvād,
GSP29snyayvpu:1291: itareṣāṃ tadabhāvād iti cen nāikasvabhāvasya khaṇḍaśo vyañjanāyogāt sannihitaviśeṣavyañjitam eva tat sarvatra svabhāvāntarābhāvāt sarvaviśeṣagataṃ ca tadrūpam, atas taddarśanaṃ kena vāryeta. atha dvitīyaḥ kalpas, tathā sati yathāikaviśeṣopalambhasamaye nopalabhyate, tathā śeṣaviśeṣopalambhakāle 'pi nopalabhyeta, viśeṣābhāvāt. atas tadabhāva evoktaḥ syāt, kevalasyopalambhābhāvāt. upalambhe 'pi svasvabhāvasthiter
GSP29snyayvpu:1293: nūtanaviśeṣotpāde sati kathaṃ tena saha sambandham anubhavet? na tāvad viśeṣāntarebhyas tad utpitsuviśeṣadeśaṃ gantum arhati, niṣkriyatvāt. nāpi
GSP29snyayvpu:1294: tatrāivābhavad, viśeṣotpādāt prāk taddeśe tadupalambhābhāvāt. nāpi viśeṣeṇāiva sahotpadyate, nityatvān, nityasya cotpattivirodhāt.
GSP29snyayvpu:1295: athāitaddoṣaparijihīrṣayā tat sakriyākam abhidhīyeta, tathāpi pūrvavyaktityāgena vā nūtanaviśeṣadeśam ākrāmet, tadabhāvena vā? na tāvad adyaḥ pakṣaś, cirantanavyaktīnāṃ sāmānyavikalatayā tatsambandhasādhyabuddhidhvanivirahaprasaṅgāt. na cāitad asty,
GSP29snyayvpu:1296: aparāparaviśeṣotpāde 'pi prācīnavyaktiṣu taddarśanāt. atha dvitīyaḥ kalpas, tad apy asambaddhaṃ, niravayavasya pūrvavyaktityāgavaikalye saty
GSP29snyayvpu:1298: evāpāstatvān, nāitadabhyupagamadvāreṇa parihāraḥ śreyān. anyac ca:
GSP29snyayvpu:1299: vyatiriktasāmānyasambandhād yadi bhāvāḥ samānā, na svarūpeṇa, tadā sattvasambandhāt prāg bhāvāḥ santo 'santo vā. santaś ced apārthakaḥ
GSP29snyayvpu:1301: punaḥsattāntarasambandhānivāraṇāt. asantaś ced atyantāsatām api gaganāravindādīnāṃ sattāsambandhād bhāvarūpatāpadyeta. evaṃ dravyatvaguṇatvakarmatvagotvādisāmānyeṣv api samastam etad vācyam,
GSP29snyayvpu:1302: ekayogakṣematvāt, tan na parasparam atyantavyatirekiṇau sāmānyaviśeṣau kathañcana ghaṭām āṭīkete. ata eva tatsamarthanapravaṇas
GSP29snyayvpu:1303: tattādātmyapratikṣepako 'bhiprāyo nirālambanatvān naigamadurnayavyapadeśam āskandati, tādātmyopekṣayāiva sāmānyaviśeṣavyatirekasamarthakasya naigamanayatvād, vyatirekiṇor api tayor vastuni kathañcid bhāvād, itarathā vivakṣayāpi tathā darśayitum aśakyatvāt, pradhānopasarjanabhāvasya
GSP29snyayvpu:1306: tadanyatarasamarthakaḥ punar nirālambanatvād durnayatāṃ svīkarotīti sthitam.
GSP29snyayvpu:1309: viśeṣavikalasya sāmānyasyāsambhavāt. tathā hi: yat tāvad uktaṃ -- yad uta "viśeṣāḥ sāmānyād vyatirekiṇo 'vyatirekiṇo vā. vyatirekapakṣe
GSP29snyayvpu:1311: tadavyatiriktatvāt, tatsvarūpavad" iti -- tad ayuktaṃ, viśeṣavādino 'py
GSP29snyayvpu:1312: evaṃvidhavikalpasambhavāt. tathā hi: viśeṣebhyaḥ sāmānyaṃ vyatiriktam
GSP29snyayvpu:1313: avyatiriktaṃ vā. vyatiriktaṃ cen, na tarhi sāmānyaṃ,
GSP29snyayvpu:1314: svasvarūpavyavasthitatayā viśeṣarūpatvāt. avyatiriktaṃ cet, tathāpi na sāmānyaṃ, viśeṣāvyatiriktatvād eva tatsvarūpavat. yad apy avādy --
GSP29snyayvpu:1315: "anādyavidyābalapravṛtto viśeṣavyavahāras, tāttvikaṃ sāmānyaṃ" -- tad api vacanamātram eva, yuktiriktatvāt, sāmānyam evānādyavidyādarśitaṃ, viśeṣāḥ punaḥ pāramārthikā iti viśeṣavādino 'pi vadato vaktrabhaṅgābhāvāt. yat punar viśeṣagrāhakapramāṇābhāvaṃ pratipādayatābhyadhāyi, yad uta "pratyakṣaṃ bhāvasampāditasattākaṃ tam eva sākṣātkaroti nābhāvaṃ,
GSP29snyayvpu:1316: tasyānutpādakatvād" ityādi, tad ayuktataraṃ, yataḥ kenedaṃ bhavato
GSP29snyayvpu:1317: 'tyantasuhṛdā niveditaṃ: "bhāva eva kevalaḥ pratyakṣam utthāpayati, na punar abhāvo 'pi" [iti]? abhāvavyāpārābhāvapratipādakayuktikalāpeneti ced mugdhavipratārito 'si, tadvyāpārābhāvāsiddheḥ, sadasadrūpavastunaḥ samastakriyāsu vyāpārād, bhāvatādātmyena vyavasthitasyābhāvasya vyāpāre
GSP29snyayvpu:1318: virodhābhāvāt. kathaṃ bhāvābhāvayos tādātmyaṃ, virodhād? iti cen, na,
GSP29snyayvpu:1319: pramāṇaprasiddhe virodhābhāvāt. tathā hi: ghaṭādikaḥ padārthātmā svarūpeṇa
GSP29snyayvpu:1320: san, na paṭādirūpeṇāpīti bhāvābhāvātmakaḥ. yadi punaḥ kathañcin
GSP29snyayvpu:1321: nābhāvātmakaḥ syāt, tadā paṭādirūpeṇāpi bhāvāt sarvātmakaḥ prāpnoti.
GSP29snyayvpu:1322: yuktam etad, ata eva bhedaprapañcavilayasiddhir iti cet, syād evāitad,
GSP29snyayvpu:1323: yadi paṭādyabhāvāikāntāc chūnyavādino 'pi manorathapūraṇaṃ na syāt; tathā
GSP29snyayvpu:1324: hi: paṭādivivikto ghaṭo 'nubhūyate, na ca paṭādyabhāvo bhāvena saha tādātmyam anubhavati, tasmād abhāvātmaka evāyam, evaṃ paṭādayo 'pītaretarāpekṣayeti śūnyatvāpattiḥ. tasmāt svarūpam ābibhrāṇaṃ
GSP29snyayvpu:1325: pararūpebhyo vyāvṛttam eva vastu sarvakriyāsu vyāpriyata iti bhāvābhāvātmakasyāiva vyāpāraḥ, svarūpadhāraṇasya bhāvatvāt,
GSP29snyayvpu:1327: vyāpriyate, tataś ca tadrūpam eva tat sākṣātkuryād iti svarūpaniyate pararūpebhyo vyāvṛtta eva vastuni pratyakṣaṃ pravartate, tajjanyatvān, na
GSP29snyayvpu:1328: bhāvamātre, tasya kevalasya svarūpāvyavasthiter utpādakatvāyogāt. na ca janakatvād artho grāhyo janyatvād vā jñānaṃ grāhakam, atiprasaṅgād ity uktaṃ, kiṃ tarhy āvaraṇavicchedāder labdhasattākaṃ grahaṇapariṇāmāj jñānaṃ
GSP29snyayvpu:1329: gṛhṇāty, arthas tu sannidhānāder gṛhyate, sa cānuvartamānavyāvartamānarūpa eva pratīyata iti tathābhūto 'bhyupagantavyo, na kevalasāmānyarūpa iti.
GSP29snyayvpu:1330: sadasadaṃśayoḥ katham ekatrāvasthānam iti cet, tādātmyeneti brūmaḥ. nanu tādātmye bhāvamātram abhāvamātraṃ vāpadyetetaretarāvyavatiriktatvād,
GSP29snyayvpu:1331: itaretarasvarūpavat, tan nobhayarūpavastusiddhiḥ. nāitad asti, tādātmyasya
GSP29snyayvpu:1332: sambandhatvāt, sambandhasya ca dvayaniṣṭhatvāt, tadabhāve kasya kena
GSP29snyayvpu:1333: sambandho, nirgocaratvāt? tasmād etau sadasadaṃśau dharmirūpatayābhedinau,
GSP29snyayvpu:1334: vastunaḥ sadasadrūpasyāikatvād, dharmarūpatayā punar vivakṣitau bhedam
GSP29snyayvpu:1335: anubhavataḥ, svarūpeṇa bhāvāt, pararūpeṇa tv abhāvād iti. tad evaṃ pratyakṣe viviktavastugrāhiṇi sakalapramāṇapraṣṭhe prasādhite śeṣapramāṇāny api tadanusāritayā viviktam eva svagocaraṃ sthāpayantīti.
GSP29snyayvpu:1336: tadapalāpī kevalasāmānyapratiṣṭhāpakaḥ kadabhiprāyaḥ saṅgrahadurnayavyapadeśaṃ svīkurute, viśeṣāpekṣayāiva sāmānyasthāpakasya saṅgrahanayatvād iti.
GSP29snyayvpu:1338: yuktiriktam avicāritaramaṇīyaṃ lokavyavahāramārgānusāri samarthayamāno durnayatām ātmani nidhatte,
GSP29snyayvpu:1339: vyavasthānābhāvāt. tathā hi: yad idaṃ kiyatkālabhāvi sthūratām ābibhrāṇaṃ lokavyavahārakāri ghaṭādikaṃ bhavatas tāttvikam abhipretaṃ tan nākasmikaṃ,
GSP29snyayvpu:1340: kiṃ tarhi nityaparamāṇughaṭitam, itarathā niṣkāraṇatvena sarvadā
GSP29snyayvpu:1341: bhāvābhāvaprasaṅgāt. na te paramāṇavas tathā pratibhāntīti cen, nāta eva teṣām anumānataḥ siddhiḥ. yadi punar yad eva sākṣān na viśadadarśane cakāsti tat sakalam apalapyeta, hanta bahv idānīm apalapanīyaṃ,
GSP29snyayvpu:1342: ghaṭādivastuno 'py arvāgbhāgavartitvaṅmātrapratibhāsān madhyaparabhāgādīnām apalāpaprasaṅgāt, tathā ca lokavyavahārakāritāpi
GSP29snyayvpu:1343: viśīryeta, tāvatā tadasiddheḥ. athātrānumānabalena vyavahārakṣamasampūrṇavastunaḥ sādhanam, evaṃ tarhi bhūtabhāviparyāyaparamāṇusādhanam api kriyatāṃ, viśeṣābhāvāt. tathā hi:
GSP29snyayvpu:1345: madhyabhāgādisādhanena sampūrṇāni tatsamarthāni tāni sādhyante, tathāiva kiyatkālabhāvighanākāradarśane
GSP29snyayvpu:1347: 'pi teṣām anupapatteḥ. tathā hi: vyavahārāvatāriṇo darśanayogyasyādyaparyāyasya tāvad atītaparyāyānabhyupagame
GSP29snyayvpu:1348: tatra cokto doṣaḥ. tadutpādakānantaraparyāyeṣṭau punas tajjanakaparyāyo
GSP29snyayvpu:1349: 'py abhyupagantavya ity anādiparyāyaparamparā siddhim adhyāsīta. tathā vyavahārāvatārivastuparyantaparyāyasya paryāyāntarānutpādakatve balād avastutvam āḍhaukate, bhavannīter evārthakriyākaraṇavaikalyāt.
GSP29snyayvpu:1350: tadutpādakatve punar asāv apy aparaparyāyotpādaka ity
GSP29snyayvpu:1351: anantaparyāyamālopapadyate. tathā ghanākāro 'pi viśadadarśanena sākṣātkriyamāṇo niṣpradeśaparyantāvayavavyatirekeṇa
GSP29snyayvpu:1353: tadavayavānām apy avayavāntaraghaṭitatvāt. paramāṇava eva paryantāvayavāḥ
GSP29snyayvpu:1355: sarvatropalabhyeta, na vā kvacid, viśeṣābhāvāt. etena yad avādi:
GSP29snyayvpu:1356: lokavyavahārāvatāriṇaḥ pramāṇam anugrāhakam asti vastuno netarasyetyādi,
GSP29snyayvpu:1358: tatsādhanāt. yat punar uktaṃ: "kiṃ teṣām atītānāgataparyāyaparamāṇvādīnāṃ paryālocanena lokavyavahārānupayogitayāvastutvād" ityādi, tad ayuktam,
GSP29snyayvpu:1360: sarvalokānupayogitvāt. kasyacid upayogitayā vastutve teṣām api sā samasty
GSP29snyayvpu:1361: eva, sarvajñajñānādigocaratvād ity āstāṃ tāvat. tad evaṃ pramāṇaprasiddhārthāpalāpitvād vyavahāro durnayaḥ, tadupekṣayā vyavahārānupātivastusamarthakasya vyavahāranayatvād iti.
GSP29snyayvpu:1362: [NAV_29.26] atha ṛjusūtro 'pi dṛṣṭāpalāpenādṛṣṭam eva kṣaṇakṣayiparamāṇulakṣaṇaṃ vastusvarūpaṃ paramārthatayā manyamāno durnayatām āskandati, dṛśyamānasthirasthūrārthāpahnave nirmūlatayā svābhipretavastusamarthakaparāmarśasyotthānābhāvāt. tathā hi:
GSP29snyayvpu:1363: svāvayavavyāpinaṃ kālāntarasaṃcariṣṇum ākāraṃ sākṣāl lakṣayan paścāt kuyuktivikalpena vivecayed, yad utāiṣa sthirasthūro dṛśyamānaḥ khalv ākāro
GSP29snyayvpu:1364: na ghaṭām iyarti. vicārākṣamatvād ityādinā na ca dṛṣṭam adṛṣṭasandarśakaiḥ
GSP29snyayvpu:1367: prāktanī yathodīcīnena tannirṇayakāriṇā vikalpena bādhyate, tathedam api sthirasthūradarśanaṃ kṣaṇakṣayiparamāṇuprasādhakaparāmarśena, kim
GSP29snyayvpu:1370: api nivartayitum aśakyatvāt. atrāpy atītavartsyator vinaṣṭānutpannatayāsannihitatvāt, sthūrāvayavānāṃ ca svāvayaveṣu
GSP29snyayvpu:1371: bhedābhedadvāreṇa paryālocyamānānām avasthānābhāvāt kṣaṇakṣayiparamāṇava eva pratibhānti, tataś ca pratibhāsa eva sthirasthūradarśanasya bādhaka
GSP29snyayvpu:1372: iti ced, evaṃ tarhi pratibhāsasyopadeśagamyatānupapattes, tathāiva vyavahāraḥ pravarteta. pāścātyamithyāvikalpaviplavān na pravartata iti
GSP29snyayvpu:1373: cen, nānyatrāpy asyottarasya viplavahetutvāt. tathā hi: dhavale jalajādau pratibhāte 'pi nīlo 'yam adhyakṣeṇāvalokitaḥ;
GSP29snyayvpu:1374: pāścātyamithyāvikalpaviplavāt tu dhavalaḥ pratibhātīti bhavannyāyena śaṭhaḥ pratijānānaḥ kena vāryeta. tan na dṛṣṭāpalāpaḥ kartuṃ śakya iti
GSP29snyayvpu:1375: sthirasthūravastusiddhis, tasyāiva darśanād, itarasya taddarśanadvāreṇa sādhyamānasyānumeyatvāt, tadaniṣṭau tasyāpy asiddheḥ. etena sthirasthūravastuno 'rthakriyāvirahapratipādanam api prativyūḍhaṃ,
GSP29snyayvpu:1377: 'rthakriyāniṣedhāc ca, yathoktaṃ prāk: "kṣaṇabhaṅguro hy arthātmā svakṣane
GSP29snyayvpu:1378: pūrvaṃ paścād vā kāryaṃ kuryād ityādi. kiṃ ca,
GSP29snyayvpu:1380: dravyaparyāyātmakatvam, abhedasya dravyatvād, bhedasya paryāyarūpatvād iti. tataś ca bhūtabhāvikṣaṇayor asannidhānadvāreṇa vārtamānikakṣaṇasyāivārthakriyākāritvapratipādanaṃ nāsmādbādhākaraṃ,
GSP29snyayvpu:1383: draṣṭāpi dravyarūpatayā tathābhūta eva. tataś ca kṣaṇikaparyāyatirodhānadvāreṇa tadrūpasaṅkalanāt sthiram evedaṃ samastakriyāsu vyāpriyata iti pratītivīthim avatarati, sthairyasyāpi
GSP29snyayvpu:1385: prākṛtalokajñānasyāvaraṇakṣayopaśamāpekṣitayā katicidaṃśaviṣayatvāt. yadi punar dravyabuddhiḥ paryāyaparamparādarśanabalāyātatvād atāttvikī kalpyeta, tadā pūrvaparyāyasyottaraparyāyotpādane sānvayatvaṃ
GSP29snyayvpu:1386: niranvayatvaṃ vā vaktavyaṃ, gatyantarābhāvāt. sānvayatve dravyaṃ paryāyāntareṇābhihitaṃ syān; niranvayatve punar nirhetutayottaraparyāyānutpādaprasaṅgaḥ. tan
GSP29snyayvpu:1389: kṣanāntarānārambhakatvenāvastutvaprāptes, tadavastutve punar upāntyakṣaṇasyāpi vastuni vyāpārābhāvād; evaṃ yāvat sarvakṣaṇānāṃ
GSP29snyayvpu:1391: svagocarajñānajanakatvam arthakriyā parikalpyeta, tathā saty atītabhāviparyāyaparamparāpi yogijñānagocaratāṃ yātīti vastutvaṃ
GSP29snyayvpu:1392: svīkuryāt. tan nārthakriyā vastulakṣaṇam, api tūtpādavyayadhrauvyayuktatā,
GSP29snyayvpu:1393: pramāṇapratiṣṭhitatvāt. utpādavyayau dhrauvyena saha viruddhāv iti cet,
GSP29snyayvpu:1394: kuto 'yaṃ virodhaḥ: pramāṇād apramāṇād vā? na tāvad ādyaḥ pakṣaḥ,
GSP29snyayvpu:1395: sarvapramāṇānāṃ bahir antaś ca tathāvidhāvastudyotanapaṭiṣṭhatayā prasādhitatvāt. nāpi dvitīyo, 'pramāṇasyākiñcitkaratvāt. etena sthūratādūṣaṇam api pratikṣiptaṃ, pratibhāsahatatvāt, tadapahnavena virodhodbhāvanasya nirmūlatayā pralāpamātratvāt. yat punar vartamānaprakāśarūpatayā tatsambaddhavastugrāhitvaṃ sarvapramāṇānām
GSP29snyayvpu:1396: udagrāhi, tad ayuktaṃ, teṣām ekāntena vārtamānikatvāsiddheḥ, kathañcid
GSP29snyayvpu:1397: ātmāvyatirekitvāt, tasya ca kālatrayavyāpakatvāt, tadrūpatayā teṣām apy
GSP29snyayvpu:1398: avasthānāt. tataś cātmano 'rthagrahaṇapariṇāmarūpatvāt, sarvapramāṇānāṃ pariṇāminy eva vastuni vyāpāro, na kṣaṇike. na cātītānāgatakṣaṇavartivastugrahaṇe 'py
GSP29snyayvpu:1401: bahiraṅgatvāt. sāmastyena punar āvaraṇavilaye sati samastavastuvistārānādyanantakṣaṇaparamparāgrahaṇaprasaṅgo na no
GSP29snyayvpu:1402: bādhākārīṣṭatvāt. tad ekadeśakṣayopaśame punas tadanusāriṇī bodhapravṛttir iti kiyatkālabhāvini sthūre vastuni prākṛtalokajñānāni pravartante, na
GSP29snyayvpu:1403: sampūrṇe. na ca tāny alīkāni, tadgrāhyāṃśasyāpi vastuni bhāvāt, tāvatāiva vyavahārasiddher iti. yac coktaṃ: kṣaṇikatāṃ gṛhṇanto 'pi
GSP29snyayvpu:1405: mithyāvikalpavaśāt sthiratāvyavahāraṃ ca pravartayanti, tad ayuktaṃ,
GSP29snyayvpu:1406: bhavadākūṭena sādṛśyābhāvāt, tadabhāve tadutpādyābhimatabhrānter nirbījatayotpatter asambhavāt. tathā sthiratāropo 'pi kvacid gṛhītasthiratvasyāiva yukto nānyathā, yathā dṛṣṭaviṣadharasya mandaprakāśe
GSP29snyayvpu:1407: rajjudarśane viṣadharāropaḥ. na ca bhavatāṃ kadācana sthiratā pratītigocaracāritām anubhavati, tat kathaṃ pratikṣaṇam
GSP29snyayvpu:1409: iti. tasmāt tirohitakṣaṇavivartam alakṣitaparamāṇuvaiviktyaṃ vastu sarvasāṃvyavahārikapramāṇair gocarīkriyata iti tattiraskāradvāreṇādṛṣṭakṣaṇakṣayiparamāṇupratiṣṭhāpako 'bhiprāya
GSP29snyayvpu:1410: ṛjusūtradurnayasaṃjñām aśnute, tadupekṣayāiva taddarśakasya nayatvād iti.
GSP29snyayvpu:1413: pratīyamānatvalakṣaṇasya hetor anaikāntikatvāt. tathā hi: nāyam ekānto yatpratītau yat pratīyate tat tato 'vyatiriktam eva, vyatiriktasyāpi pāvakāder anyathānupapannatvalakṣaṇasambandhabalād dhūmādipratītau
GSP29snyayvpu:1414: pratīyamānatvāt. evaṃ śabdo 'pi vyatiriktam apy arthaṃ vācakatvāt
GSP29snyayvpu:1416: vivekenāivānubhūyamānatvāt. asmiṃś ca hetāv anaikāntike sthite sarvārthānāṃ sasvavācakatvasādhanadvāreṇa śabdāvyatirekasādhanam api dūrāpāstam eva. na cātrāpi pratibandhagrāhi pramāṇaṃ -- yo yo 'rthas tena tena sasvavācakena bhavitavyaṃ -- ghaṭādidṛṣṭāntamātrāt tadasiddheḥ,
GSP29snyayvpu:1417: kṣaṇikālakṣyadravyavivartānāṃ saṅketagrahaṇopāyābhāvenābhilapitum aśakyatayānabhilāpyatvasiddheś ca. kṣaṇabhaṅguratāpratijñānaṃ punar amīṣāṃ
GSP29snyayvpu:1418: apy ṛjusūtravan nirasitavyam. tathā pratyekamatāpekṣayāpi svābhipretaṃ
GSP29snyayvpu:1419: pratiṣṭhāpayantas tadviparītaṃ śabdārthaṃ tiraskurvāṇā durnayatām ātmasātkurvanti. etāvad dhi pramāṇapratiṣṭhitaṃ, yad uta vidhimukhena
GSP29snyayvpu:1420: śabdo 'rthasya vācaka iti; na punar ayaṃ niyamo yathāyam asyāiva vācako
GSP29snyayvpu:1424: tathāivāvigānena vyavahāradarśanāt, tadaniṣṭau tallopaprasaṅgāt. tasmāt sarvadhvanayo yogyatayā sarvārthavācakā, deśakṣayopaśamādyapekṣayā tu kvacit kathañcit pratītiṃ janayanti. tataś ca kvacid
GSP29snyayvpu:1427: tatra prāmāṇikena niyatārthāgraho vidheyaḥ. ato 'mī śabdādayo yadetaretarābhimataśabdārthopekṣayā svābhimataṃ śabdārthaṃ darśayanti,
GSP29snyayvpu:1428: tadā nayās, tasyāpi tatra bhāvāt. parasparabādhayā pravartamānāḥ punar
GSP29snyayvpu:1432: durnayatāṃ pratipadyante, tadā vacanam apy ekadharmakathanadvāreṇa pravartamānaṃ sāvadhāraṇatvāc ca śeṣadharmapratikṣepakāry alīkamāpadyate.
GSP29snyayvpu:1433: tataś cānantadharmādhyāsitavastusandarśakam eva vacanaṃ yathāvasthitārthapratipādakatvāt satyaṃ; na cāivaṃ vacanapravṛttir, ghaṭo
GSP29snyayvpu:1434: 'yaṃ śuklo mūrta ityādy ekāikadharmapratipādananiṣṭhatayā vyavahāre śabdaprayogadarśanāt, sarvadharmāṇāṃ yaugapadyena vaktum aśakyatvāt,
GSP29snyayvpu:1435: tadabhidhāyakānām apyānantyāt. na cāikāikadharmasandarśakatve 'py amūni vacanāny alīkāni vaktuṃ pāryante, samastaśābdavyavahārocchedaprasaṅgāt,
GSP29snyayvpu:1436: tadalīkatve tataḥ pravṛttyasiddher iti. atrocyata -- iha tāvad dvaye
GSP29snyayvpu:1437: vastupratipādakā, laukikās tattvacintakāś ca. tatra pratyakṣādiprasiddham artham arthitvavaśāl laukikās tāvan madhyasthabhāvena vyavahārakāle
GSP29snyayvpu:1438: vyapadiśyanti, yad uta nīlam utpalaṃ sugandhi komalam iti, na tu taddharmigatadharmāntaragrahaṇanirākaraṇayorādriyante,
GSP29snyayvpu:1439: tāvatāiva vivakṣitavyavahāraparisamāpteḥ. na ca tadvacanānām alīkatā,
GSP29snyayvpu:1444: yathānekapuruṣasampūrṇe sadasi dvārādau sthitasya kim atra devadattaḥ samasti nāstīti vā dolāyamānabuddheḥ kenacid abhidhīyate -- yathā devadatto 'stīti. atra yady apy upanyastapadadvayasya sāvadhāraṇatā gamyate, 'nyathā taduccāraṇavaiyarthyaprasaṅgāt, tathāpy avadhāraṇaṃ tadasambhavamātraṃ vyavacchinatti, na śeṣapuruṣāntarāṇi; nāpi pararūpeṇa nāstitvaṃ, tadvyavacchedābhiprāyeṇa prastutavākyaprayogāt,
GSP29snyayvpu:1445: prayoktrabhiprāyādisāpekṣatayāiva dhvaneḥ svārthapratipādanasāmarthyāt. na ca vācyavācakabhāvalakṣaṇasambandhānarthakyaṃ, tadabhāve prayoktrabhiprāyamātreṇa rūpasyāiva niyoktum aśakyatvāt. na ca samastadharmayuktam eva vastu pratipādayad vacanaṃ satyam ity
GSP29snyayvpu:1446: abhidadhmahe, yenāikāikadharmāliṅgitavastusandarśakānām alīkatā syāt, kiṃ tarhi sambhavadarthapratipādakaṃ satyam iti, sambhavanti ca śeṣadharmāpratikṣepe vacanagocarāpannā dharmās; tasmāt tatpratipādakaṃ satyam eva. yadā tu durnayamatābhiniviṣṭabuddhibhis tīrthāntarīyais taddharmigatadharmāntaranirākaraṇābhiprāyeṇāiva sāvadhāraṇaṃ tat
GSP29snyayvpu:1447: prayujyate, yathānityam eva vastu nityam eva vetyādi, tadā nirālambanatvād alīkatāṃ prāpnuvat kena vāryeta? tattvacintakāḥ punaḥ pratyakṣādipramāṇasiddham anekāntātmakaṃ vastu darśayanto dvedhā darśayeyus, tad yathā -- vikalādeśena sakalādeśena vā. tatra vikālādeśo nayādhīnaḥ, sakalādeśaḥ pramāṇāyattaḥ. tathā hi: yadā madhyasthabhāvenārthitvavaśāt kiñcid dharmaṃ pratipipādayiṣavaḥ śeṣadharmasvīkaraṇanirākaraṇavimukhayā dhiyā vācaṃ prayuñjate, tadā tattvacintakā api laukikavat sammugdhākāratayācakṣate, yad uta "jīvo 'sti
GSP29snyayvpu:1448: kartā pramātā bhoktetyādi". ataḥ sampūrṇavastupratipādanābhāvād vikalādeśo
GSP29snyayvpu:1449: 'bhidhīyate, nayamatena sambhavaddharmāṇāṃ darśanamātram ity arthaḥ. yadā tu pramāṇavyāpāram avikalaṃ parāmṛśya pratipādayitum abhiprayanti,
GSP29snyayvpu:1450: tadāṅgīkṛtaguṇapradhānabhāvāśeṣadharmasūcakakathañcitparyāyasyācchabdabhūṣitayā sāvadhāraṇayā ca vācā darśayanti ‘syād asty eva jīva'; ityādikayā. ato
GSP29snyayvpu:1451: 'yaṃ syācchabdasaṃsūcitābhyantarībhūtānantadharmakasya sākṣādupanyastajīvaśabdakriyābhyāṃ pradhanīkṛtātmabhāvasyāvadhāraṇavyavacchinnatadasambhavasya vastunaḥ sandarśakatvāt sakalādeśa ity ucyate,
GSP29snyayvpu:1454: sakalagrāhi tu mānaṃ vikalagrāhī nayo jñeyaḥ //
GSP29snyayvpu:1455: [NAV_29.29] tad idam uktaṃ bhavati: nayapramāṇābhijñaḥ syādvādī sakalavikalādeśāv adhikṛtya vastusvarūpapratipipādayiṣayā yad yad brūte
GSP29snyayvpu:1456: tat tat satyaṃ, sambhavadarthagocaratvāt. durnayamatāvalambinaḥ punar ekāntavādino yad yad ācakṣate tat tad alīkam, asambhavadarthaviṣayatvād
GSP29snyayvpu:1459: ekāikanayamatapravṛttāni sūtrāṇi na sampūrṇārthābhidhāyakānīty, api tu tatsamudāyābhiprāyapravṛttam avikalavastunivedakam iti darśayann āha:
GSP29snyayvpu:1462: [NAV_30.1] iha trividhaṃ śrutaṃ, tad yathā -- mithyāśrutaṃ nayaśrutaṃ syādvādaśrutaṃ ca. tatra śrūyata iti śrutam āgamaḥ. mithyālīkaṃ śrutaṃ mithyāśrutaṃ, tac ca durnayābhiprāyapravṛttaṃ tīrthikasambandhi,
GSP29snyayvpu:1463: nirgocaratvāt. tathā nayair hetubhūtaiḥ śrutaṃ nayaśrutam, etac cārhadāgamāntargatam evāikanayābhiprāyapratibaddhaṃ, yathā "paḍuppaṇṇe
GSP29snyayvpu:1464: neraïë viṇassaï" ityādy, ṛjusūtranayābhiprāyeṇa kṣaṇikatvasyāpi tatra
GSP29snyayvpu:1465: sambhavāt. tathā nirdiśyamānadharmavyatiriktāśeṣadharmāntarasaṃsūcakena syātā yukto vādo 'bhipretadharmavacanaṃ syādvādaḥ, tadātmakaṃ śrutaṃ syādvādaśrutam. tat kiṃbhūtam ucyata ity āha: sampūrṇo 'vikalaḥ sa cāsāv arthaś ca tadviniścāyi tannirṇayahetutvād evam abhidhīyate; paramārthataḥ punaḥ samastavastusvarūpapratipādīty arthaḥ, śabdātmakatvān, niścayasya bodharūpatvād iti. nayaśrutaṃ tarhi sampūrṇārthaviniścāyi kasmān na bhavatīty āha: nayānāṃ naigamādīnām ekaniṣṭḥānām
GSP29snyayvpu:1466: ekadharmagrahaṇaparyavasitānāṃ śrutavartmany āgamamārge pravṛtteḥ pravartanān na tad ekāikābhiprāyapratibaddhaṃ
GSP29snyayvpu:1469: pratipādyādhunāśeṣanayapramāṇavyāpakaṃ teṣāṃ tatra tādātmyenāvasthānāt pramātāram abhidhātukāma
GSP29snyayvpu:1472: [NAV_31.1] tatra trikālajīvanāj jīvaḥ, prāṇadhāraka ātmety arthaḥ, sa pramiṇotīti pramātā prameyaparicchedakaḥ. kiṃbhūtaḥ sann ity āha: svānyāv ātmaparau nirbhāsitum uddyotayituṃ śīlam asyeti svānyanirbhāsī,
GSP29snyayvpu:1473: svasvarūpārthayoḥ prakāśaka iti yāvat. tathā karotīti kartā, bhuṅkta iti bhoktā, vivartanam aparāparaparyāyeṣu gamanaṃ vivṛttiḥ pariṇāmaḥ, sā vidyate yasyeti vivṛttimān. sva ātmā saṃvedyate 'neneti svasaṃvedanaṃ tena samyak siddhaḥ pratiṣṭhitaḥ pratīto vā svasaṃvedanasaṃsiddhaḥ. kṣitiḥ pṛthivy ādir yeṣāṃ tāni kṣityādīny, ādiśabdād ambutejovāyvākāśāni gṛhyante; na vidyata ātmā svarūpam asyety anātmakaḥ, kiṃ
GSP29snyayvpu:1476: [NAV_31.2] tatra jīvaḥ pramātetyanena ye pāramārthikaṃ pramātāraṃ
GSP29snyayvpu:1477: nābhyupagacchanty, api tu vijñānakṣaṇaparamparānubhavabalaprabodhitānādiprarūḍhavāsanāsampāditasattākaṃ mithyāvikalpaparikalpitam apāramārthikaṃ taṃ manyante pratikṣaṇavilayavādinaḥ tān nirācaṣṭe, kṣaṇavilayasya prāg eva
GSP29snyayvpu:1478: pratiṣiddhatvād, bahir antaś ca pariṇāmivastunaḥ prasādhanāt.
GSP29snyayvpu:1479: [NAV_31.3] nanu ca ghaṭādayas tāvad vināśam āviśanto dṛśyante, teṣāṃ ca vināśo lakuṭādikāraṇakalāpenāvinaśvarasvabhāvānāṃ vā kriyeta,
GSP29snyayvpu:1480: vinaśvarasvabhāvānāṃ vā. yady ādyaḥ kalpas tad ayuktaṃ, svabhāvasya pracyāvayitum aśakyatvāt, tasya niyatarūpatvād, anyathā svabhāvatvāyogāt.
GSP29snyayvpu:1481: athāivaṃbhūta eva tasya svabhāvaḥ svakāraṇabalāyāto yad uta vināśakāraṇam āsādya vinaṅkṣyatīti brūṣe, tathāpi tadvināśakāraṇasannidhānaṃ kiṃ
GSP29snyayvpu:1482: yādṛcchikam uta tatsvabhāvasampādyam eva. yadādyaḥ kalpas, tadā sannihitasyāpi tatpratyanīkapratyayopanipātena
GSP29snyayvpu:1484: sannihitānām api pratidvandvinā nivartanād, yādṛcchikatvāc ca nāvaśyaṃbhāvi tatsannidhānaṃ; tataś cāsannihitasvavināśakāraṇakadambakaḥ kaścid ghaṭādir na vinaśyed apy, aniṣṭaṃ cāitat, sarvakṛtakānāṃ
GSP29snyayvpu:1485: vināśāvigānāt. atha dvitīyaḥ pakṣas, tathā sati paścād api tadbalād vināśahetavaḥ sannidhāsyantīti prathamakṣaṇa eva sannidadhatu, tathāpi
GSP29snyayvpu:1486: kṣaṇikatāivārthasya. svahetor eva niyatakālāt parato 'yaṃ svavināśahetuṃ sannidhāpayiṣyatīty evaṃrūpo jāta iti cen, nāivam api kṣaṇabhaṅguratāyātā.
GSP29snyayvpu:1487: tathā hi: svahetunā kilāsau varṣāt parataḥ svavināśahetusannidhāpanakṣamasvabhāvo vyadhāyi; sa ca tasyotpādakṣaṇād
GSP29snyayvpu:1488: dvitīyakṣaṇe svabhāvo 'sti vā na vā? asti cet, tathā sati punar varṣaṃ tena sthātavyam, evaṃ yāvad varṣopāntyakṣaṇe 'pi yadi tatsvabhāva evāsau
GSP29snyayvpu:1489: tadāparam api varṣāntaraṃ sthitir āpadyeta, tadā cānantakalpasthāyībhāvaḥ syād, apracyutavarṣasthāyisvabhāvatvād iti. atha dvitīyakṣaṇe nāsti sa svabhāva iti brūṣe, hanta kṣaṇikatvam evāḍhaukate, 'tādavasthyasya
GSP29snyayvpu:1490: tallakṣaṇatvāt. kiṃ ca, vināśahetur bhāvasya vināśaṃ vyatiriktam avyatiriktaṃ vā kuryāt? vyatiriktakaraṇe na kiñcit kṛtaṃ syāt, tataś ca bhāvas tādavasthyam anubhavet. tatsambandhaḥ kriyata iti cen, na sambandhasya tādātmyatadutpattivyatiriktasya pratiṣedhāt. na cānayor anyataraḥ sambandho 'tra samasti, vyatirekiṇā sārddhaṃ tādātmyāyogād,
GSP29snyayvpu:1491: anyahetukasya paścād utpannasya tadutpattivaikalyāt. tan na vyatirikto
GSP29snyayvpu:1492: vināśaḥ kartuṃ yuktaḥ. avyatiriktakaraṇe punas tam eva bhāvaṃ vināśahetuḥ
GSP29snyayvpu:1493: karotīti prāptam, avyatirekasya tadrūpatālakṣaṇatvāt. na cāsau kartavyaḥ,
GSP29snyayvpu:1494: svahetor eva niṣpannatvāt, tatkaraṇe ca tasyāvasthānam eva syān, na
GSP29snyayvpu:1495: pralayaḥ. tan nāvinaśvarasvabhāvānāṃ paścāt kathañcid api vināśaḥ kartuṃ
GSP29snyayvpu:1496: śakyo, vinaśvarasvabhāvānāṃ punaḥ svahetubalāyātatvāt prāg api pratikṣaṇabhāvī, na kāraṇāntarāpekṣaḥ, svabhāvasya niyatarūpatvāt; tasmāt prāṇity adyāpi pratikṣaṇavilaya iti.
GSP29snyayvpu:1497: [NAV_31.4] atrocyate -- satyam etat, kiṃ tu yathā vināśakāraṇāyogāt pratikṣaṇabhāvī vināśo bhavadbhiḥ pratipadyate, tathāiva sthityutpattī pratikṣaṇabhāvinyau kiṃ na pratipadyete, taddhetūnām api vicāryamāṇānām
GSP29snyayvpu:1498: ayogāt. tathā hi: sthitihetunā tāvat svayam asthirasvabhāvā bhāvāḥ sthāpyeran sthirasvabhāvā vā? na tāvat prathamaḥ pakṣaḥ kṣodaṃ kṣamate,
GSP29snyayvpu:1500: cetanācetanasvabhāvavad, anyathā svabhāvatāhāneḥ. dvitīyapakṣe punaḥ svayaṃ sthirasvabhāvānāṃ kiṃ sthitihetunā? sthitir neṣyata eva,
GSP29snyayvpu:1501: tenānabhyupagatopālambha evāyam iti ced, hanta hato 'sy, evaṃ hi bhāvāḥ
GSP29snyayvpu:1502: kṣaṇamātram api na tiṣṭheyuḥ. kṣaṇabhāvinīṣyata eveti cet, sā tarhy asthitisvabhāvānāṃ hetuśatair api kartuṃ na pāryata iti brūmaḥ,
GSP29snyayvpu:1503: tatsvabhāvatve punar hetuvyāpāranairarthakyāt. ahetukā satī sakalakālaṃ
GSP29snyayvpu:1504: bhavatīti datto jalāñjaliḥ pratikṣaṇavilayasya. tathotpādahetur api tatsvabhāvasyotpattiṃ vidadhyād atatsvabhāvasya vā? na tāvad ādyaḥ pakṣaḥ kakṣīkartuṃ yuktaḥ, svayam utpādakasyotpādane vyāpriyamāṇo hi hetuḥ piṣṭaṃ
GSP29snyayvpu:1505: pinaṣṭi, śaṅkhaṃ dhavalayati, tadabhāve 'pi svayogyatayotpatteḥ. nāpi dvitīyaḥ kalpo 'ṅgīkaraṇārhaḥ, svayam anutpattidharmakasyotpādayitum aśakyatvād, anyathā śaśaviṣāṇādayo 'py utpādyakoṭim adhyāsīran,
GSP29snyayvpu:1506: viśeṣābhāvāt; tataś ca na kaścid atyantābhāvaḥ syāt. tad yathā nirhetukatvān nāśaḥ pratikṣaṇabhāvī, tathāiva darśitayukteḥ sthityutpattī
GSP29snyayvpu:1507: apīti trayākrāntaṃ sakalaṃ vastu jātam abhyupagantavyaṃ; tathā sati jīvo
GSP29snyayvpu:1508: 'pi jīvatvacaitanyadravyatvādibhiḥ sthemānaṃ ābibhrāṇa eva harṣaviṣādādibhir aparāparārthagrahaṇapariṇāmaiś cotpādavyayadharmakaḥ pāramārthikaḥ pramāteti balāt siddhim adhyāste.
GSP29snyayvpu:1509: [NAV_31.5] nanu ca yady utpādavyayasthitīnāṃ nirhetukatvāt sakalakālabhāvitā bhavadbhiḥ sādhyate, tadānvayavyatirekābhyāṃ pratyakṣādipramāṇaprasiddhaḥ khalv ayaṃ tatkāraṇakalāpavyāpāraḥ kathaṃ
GSP29snyayvpu:1510: neyaḥ? na cāyam apahnotuṃ śakyaḥ! tathā hi: kulālādikāraṇavrātavyāpāre ghaṭādayaḥ samupalabhyante, tadabhāve ca nopalambhyanta iti tajjanyā ity
GSP29snyayvpu:1511: ucyante. sthitir api vināśakāraṇasannidhānāt prāk tadbalād eva, tathā nāśo 'pi mudgarādisannidhānāsannidhānābhyāṃ sadasattām anubhavaṃs tatkṛtaḥ
GSP29snyayvpu:1512: pratīyate, nāhetukaḥ. tat katham etad iti?
GSP29snyayvpu:1513: [NAV_31.6] atrocyate -- na vayaṃ sarvathā hetūnāṃ vyāpāraṃ vārayāmaḥ, kiṃ tarhi svayam utpādavyayasthityātmanā vivartamānasya dravyasya hetavas tadviśeṣakaraṇe vyāpāram anubhavanti, tenāiva sārddhaṃ teṣām
GSP29snyayvpu:1518: [NAV_31.7] svānyanirbhāsītyanena prāguktasvaparābhāsipramāṇaviśeṣaṇavan mīmāṃsakān parokṣabuddhivādino yogācārāṃś ca jñānamātravādinaḥ pratikṣipati, jñānajñāninoḥ kathañcid abhedena taduktanyāyāviśeṣād iti.
GSP29snyayvpu:1519: [NAV_31.8] kartā bhokteiti viśeṣaṇadvayena sāṃkhyamataṃ vikuṭṭayati, kartā san bhoktāpīti kākvopanyāsād, akartur bhogānupapatter,
GSP29snyayvpu:1520: bhujikriyānirvartanasamarthasyāiva bhoktṛtvāt. japākusumādisannidhānavaśāt sphaṭike raktatādivyapadeśavad akartur api prakṛtyupadhānavaśāt
GSP29snyayvpu:1522: prakṛtivikāradarpaṇākārabuddhisaṅkrāntānāṃ sukhaduḥkhādyātmakānām arthānāṃ puruṣaḥ sannidhānamātreṇa bhojako vyapadiśyate, "buddhyadhyavasitam arthaṃ puruṣaś cetayata" itivacanād iti cen, na, kathañcit sakriyākatāvyatirekeṇa prakṛtyupadhāne 'py anyathātvānupapatter, apracyutaprācīnarūpasya
GSP29snyayvpu:1524: sakriyatvam āpatatītinyāyāt; sphaṭikadṛṣṭānte 'pi japākusumādisannidhānād andhopalādau raktatānāvirbhavantī tatra punar āvirbhavantī tasya tathāvidhaṃ pariṇāmaṃ lakṣayaty, anyathāndhopalavat tatrāpi na prāduḥṣyāt.
GSP29snyayvpu:1526: [NAV_31.9] vivṛttimān ityamunā tv ekāntanityam apariṇāminaṃ naiyāyikavaiśeṣikādiprakalpitaṃ pramātāraṃ nirasyati,
GSP29snyayvpu:1528: vyatiriktajñānasamavāyād ekāntanityo 'pi pramiṇotīti cen, na, samavāyasya prāg eva pratikṣiptatvāt, sambandhāntarasya ca vyatirekiṇā sākam
GSP29snyayvpu:1529: anupapatter, anyatrānyathānupapannatvāt. na ca vyatirekiṇi jñāne tat samasti, tadgrāhakapramāṇābhāvād, avyatirekānubhavasya ca tadbādhakatvāt.
GSP29snyayvpu:1530: kiṃ ca, yadi samavāyabalād ātmani jñānaṃ samavaiti, tadātmanāṃ samavāyasya ca vibhutvād ekarūpatvāc ca sarvātmasu kiṃ na samavaiti, viśeṣābhāvāt?
GSP29snyayvpu:1531: tathā ca devadattajṭānena yajṭadattādayo 'py arthatattvaṃ buddhyeran.
GSP29snyayvpu:1532: anyac ca vijṭānodayasamaye 'pi yādṛśaḥ prāgavasthāyāṃ tādṛśa eva santiṣṭhamānaḥ prāg apramātā paścāt pramāteti bruvāṇaḥ khalūnmattatām ātmany āvirbhāvayati, nāparam ity āstāṃ tāvat.
GSP29snyayvpu:1535: tiraskurute, jaḍātmakabhūtāvyatireke hi tadvilakṣaṇabodharūpaharṣaviṣādādivivartānubhavābhāvaprasaṅgāt. nanu ca kāyākārapariṇatāni bhūtāny evātmavyatirekiṇīṃ cetanām utkālayanti; sā ca tathāvidhapariṇāmapariṇateṣu teṣu santiṣṭhate, tadabhāve punas teṣv eva nilīyata iti; tadvyatirekānubhave 'pi na paralokayāyijīvasiddhir, iyatāiva
GSP29snyayvpu:1536: dṛṣṭavyavahāropapatteḥ. nāitad asti, dvayaṃ hi tāvad etat saṃyogam anubhavad upalababhyate -- paṭcabhūtātmakaṃ śarīraṃ cetanā ca. tatrāpi śarīraṃ bahirmukhākāreṇa bodhenārtharūpatayā jaḍam anubhūyate, cetanā punar antarmukhākāreṇa svasaṃvedanapratyakṣeṇa sākṣātkriyate; 'ta
GSP29snyayvpu:1537: evāvyatirekapakṣaḥ pratibhāsanirākṛtatvān nāśaṅkitaḥ. vyatirekiṇoḥ punaḥ prakāśamānayor yadi bhūtāny eva cetanām utkālayantīti bhavadbhiḥ
GSP29snyayvpu:1538: parikalpyate, tadā cetanāiva bhavāntarād utpattisthānamāyātā paṭcabhūtabhrāntijanakaṃ śarīraṃ nirvartayet, punar bhavāntaraṃ yātukāmā
GSP29snyayvpu:1539: muṭcet, tat tayādhiṣṭhitaṃ gamanādiceṣṭāṃ kuryāt, tadviyuktaṃ punaḥ kāṣṭhavat tiṣṭhed iti jīvasampādyam eva śarīraṃ, na punar asau tatsampādya
GSP29snyayvpu:1540: ity, etat parikalpanaṃ yuktataraṃ paśyāmaḥ, jīvasya cetanāvataḥ sakarmakatayāparāparabhavabhramaṇāparāparaśarīranirvartanayor
GSP29snyayvpu:1542: nopalabhyata iti ced, bhūtāny api tarhi kāyākāradhāraṇadvāreṇa cetanām utkālayantīti pratyakṣeṇa nopalakṣyanta iti samāno nyāhaḥ. atha kāyākārapariṇateṣv eva bhūteṣu cetanopalabhyate,
GSP29snyayvpu:1543: nānyadetyanyathānupapattivaśāt tajjanyeti parikalpyata, evaṃ tarhi mṛtāvasthāyāṃ kāyākāram ābibhrāṇeṣv api nopalabdhā, kāyākārapariṇāmo vā kādācitkatayā hetvantarāpekṣītyanyathānupapattivaśād eva
GSP29snyayvpu:1545: kiṃ ca, jīvas tāvat karmacaitanyasambandhāc charīranirvartanārthaṃ pravarata iti yuktam evāitad, bhūtāni punaḥ kiṃbhūtāni cetanākaraṇe
GSP29snyayvpu:1546: pravarteran: sacetanāni niścetanāni vā? yady ādyaḥ kalpas, tato vikalpayugalam avatarati: tac caitanyaṃ tebhyo bhinnam abhinnam vā? yadi
GSP29snyayvpu:1547: bhinnaṃ, tadā puruṣaśarīravat tatrāpi bhūtaiḥ saha vartamānam api bhūtavilakṣaṇam ātmakāraṇam anumāpayatīti tadavasthāiva jīvasiddhiḥ.
GSP29snyayvpu:1548: athābhinnaṃ, tathā sati samastabhūtānām aikyaṃ prasajaty,
GSP29snyayvpu:1549: ekacaitanyāvyatiriktatvāt, tatsvarūpavat. nijanijacaitanyāvyatirekīṇi bhūtāni tenāyam adoṣa iti cen, na, tatsampādyapuruṣaśarīre 'pi
GSP29snyayvpu:1551: bahavas tilā iva tailaghaṭaṃ janayantīti cet, tat tarhi puruṣacaitanyaṃ
GSP29snyayvpu:1552: kiṃ teṣām eva saṃyogo yad vā tadutpādyam, anyad eva? yady ādhyaḥ kalpas,
GSP29snyayvpu:1553: tad ayuktaṃ, caitanyānāṃ parasparaṃ miśraṇābhāvena saṃyogavirodhād,
GSP29snyayvpu:1555: atha dvitīyaḥ pakṣas, tatrāpi teṣāṃ kim anvayo 'sti nāsti vā? yady asti,
GSP29snyayvpu:1556: tad ayuktaṃ, prāgvat tajjanyacaitanyapañcarūpatāpatteḥ. atha nāsti, tad apy acāru, niranvayotpādasya pramāṇabādhitatvāt. tan na sacetanāni bhūtāni cetanākaraṇe vyāpārabhāñji bhavitum arhanti. nāpi niścetanāni, teṣām atyantavilakṣaṇatayā caitanyotpādavirodhād, itarathā sikatādayas tailādikaraṇe vyāpriyeran. kiṃ ca, tatsamudāyamātrasādhyaṃ vā caitanyaṃ
GSP29snyayvpu:1557: syād viśiṣṭatatpariṇāmasādhyaṃ vā. na tāvad ādyā kḷptir,
GSP29snyayvpu:1558: ilājalānalānilanabhastalamīlane 'pi cetanānupalabdheḥ. dvitīyavikḷptau punaḥ kiṃ tad vaiśiṣṭyam iti vācyam. kāyākārapariṇāma iti cet, sa tarhi sarvadā kasmān na bhavati? kutaścid dhetvantarāpekṣaṇād iti cet, tat tarhi hetvantaraṃ bhavāntarāyātajīvacaitanyam ity anumimīmahe, tasyāiva
GSP29snyayvpu:1559: kāyākārapariṇāmasādhyacaitanyānurūpopādānakāraṇatvāt, tadvirahe kāyākārapariṇāmasadbhāve 'pi mṛtāvasthāyāṃ tadabhāvād gamanādiceṣṭānupalabdheḥ; tan na kāyākārapariṇāmajanyaṃ caitanyam, api tu sa eva tajjanya iti yuktaṃ paśyāmaḥ. na pratyakṣād anyat pramāṇam asti, na ca tena paralokagamanāgamanādikaṃ caitanyasyopalakṣyate, tena dṛṣṭāny eva
GSP29snyayvpu:1560: bhūtāni tatkāraṇatayā kalpanīyānīti cen, na, kevalapratyakṣapratikṣepeṇa pramāṇāntarāṇāṃ prāg eva prasādhitatvāt, tathā ca bhūyāṃsy anumānāni paralokānuyāyijīvasādhakāni pravarteran. tad yathā --
GSP29snyayvpu:1564: paralokayāyijīvamākṣipati, tajjanmany abhilāṣāntarābhāvāt. evam anyad apy
GSP29snyayvpu:1566: [NAV_31.11] tad ayaṃ svaparaprakāśakaḥ kartā bhoktā nityānityātmako
GSP29snyayvpu:1567: bhūtavilakṣaṇaḥ sākṣātkṛtakaticinnijaparyāyānumitānādyanantakālabhāvinijānantaparyāyavivartaḥ pramāṇapratiṣṭhitaḥ pāramārthiko jīvaḥ sakalanayapramāṇavyāpakaḥ pramāteti sthitam.
GSP29snyayvpu:1571: [NAV_32.1] pramāṇāni pratyakṣādīny; ādiśabdān nayaparigrahas, teṣāṃ vyavasthā pratiniyatalakṣaṇādirūpā maryādā, seyam anantaroktasthityā prakīrtiteti saṃsargaḥ. kiṃbhūtety āha: ādiḥ prabhavo, nidhanaṃ paryanto,
GSP29snyayvpu:1572: na vidyete ādinidhane yasyāsau tathāvidha ātmā svarūpaṃ yasyāḥ sānādinidhanātmikā; sarvasaṃvyavartḥṇāṃ laukikatīrthikādibhedabhinnasamastavyavahāravatāṃ prasiddhāpi rūḍhāpi,
GSP29snyayvpu:1573: tadaprasiddhau nikhilavyavahārocchedaprasaṅgāt, taducchede ca vicārānutthāne na kasyacit tattvasya pratiṣṭhitiḥ. prakīrtitā saṃśabditāvyutpannavipratipannavyāmohāpohāyeti gamyate; pramāṇaprasiddhe
GSP29snyayvpu:1578: hetur nayāśritakutīrthimṛgān ananyatrāṇān vihāya jinam eti tam āśrayadhvaṃ // NAV_32.1:1 //
